K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyid par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di la 'chad par gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje spro bar mdzad du gsol /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'khor 'di nyan par 'dod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba las brtsams te; 'khor 'dir spobs par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-11: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-12: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-14: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-15: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam zhig bstan pa bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-0: mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na mar me'i mthus @157b gzugs su gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad gda' ba de bzhin du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-3: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams la gang cung zad 'jug par bgyi ba tsam bstan par bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-5: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-8: de'i phyir ci nas byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rnams thos nas mi dngangs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-11: skrag par mi 'gyur bar 'khor der legs par 'khod cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi gsungs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-17: las bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-18: glu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-19: bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-20: sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-22: gang gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:157b-23: bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi rnam par bkod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-0: bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bzhi'i nang na de bzhin @158a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-1: gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu gsungs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-3: de la khyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-5: mi dngang mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-6: thos nas lhag par dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-8: mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher bskyed par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-10: ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba nyan pa la mos par gyur cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-11: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur pa de lta bu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so; ;de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-14: de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba'i gnas rnams bshad par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158a-17: gang tshun chad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems par gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de tshun chad kho bo @158b byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs 'bring na 'dug 'dug na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i lus 'gyur ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-2: lus tshul 'chos pa kho bos nam yang ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-4: ngag gi kha gsag kyang ma thos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-6: sems g-yo ba yang ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-7: de lus kyi spyod lam gyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-9: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-10: de'i lus kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mu med par snang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-12: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing sgrim pa med par gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-15: bsam gtan gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bsam gtan gyi spyod lam ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-17: glu dbyangs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgyud kyi sgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-18: glu'i dbyangs kyi spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-19: khye'us 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khye'u'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-20: bu mos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bu mo'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-21: bud med kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bud med kyi spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-22: skyes pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la skyes pa'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:158b-23: gzhon nus 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gzhon nu'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-0: bar mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bar @159a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-2: rgan pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rgan po'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-3: yan lag ma tshang bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la yan lag ma tshang ba'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-4: gdol pa rkang lag chad pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la gdol pa rkang lag chad pa'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-6: 'phye bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la lkugs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-9: 'on pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-12: sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-13: sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyi spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-16: mis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-20: lhas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-28: lto 'phye chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-35: lto 'phye chen po'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159a-36: brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi spyod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-1: tshangs pas 'dul ba'i sems can la tshangs pa'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-2: 'jig rten skyong bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten skyong ba'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-3: 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-4: 'khor los sgyur ba'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-5: dge slong gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-6: dge slong gi spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-7: dge slong mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-8: dge slong ma'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-9: dge bsnyen gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-10: dge bsnyen gyi spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-11: dge bsnyen mas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-12: dge bsnyen ma'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-13: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-14: nyan thos kyi spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-15: rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-17: byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod lam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-19: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-21: gzugs med pa ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-23: de ltar sems can thams cad kyi gzugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-24: kha dog dang spyod lam ji snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:159b-26: spyod lam yang de snyed du lhun gyis grub cing yongs su mi rtog par kun tu gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-0: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par @160a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-1: mi rtog cing btang snyoms pa de lus kyis lus kyi spyod lam ston mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-2: lus kyi chos nyid las kyang mi g-yo'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-3: lus kyis lus kyi las byed mod kyi; lus kyi dben pa yang mi 'dor ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-4: de lus yongs su dag pas lus kyi 'od kyis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-5: lus la mi lta bas sha za ba'i sems can ji snyed yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-6: sha'i longs spyod gang dang gang 'dod pa de lta bu'i sha rnams bdag gis lus las de dag la bstabs nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-8: sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-9: khrag 'thung ba rnams la khrag sbyin par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-10: rkang za ba rnams la rkang sbyin par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-11: gzi byin za ba rnams la gzi byin sbyin par byed de; ;zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-12: de ltar sha'i longs spyod ji snyed par de dag thams cad bdag gi lus las bstabs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-13: srog dang phral nas sems can de dag la sbyin par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-14: de'i lus tshad med pa ni chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa'i rjes su 'gro bas mi zad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-15: de'i lus mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-16: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi zad pa mngon par bsgrubs pas rab tu rig par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-17: de lus kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160a-18: gang dag 'dod chags la spyod pa sdug pa'i rnam pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-0: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i @160b sems can de dag gi mdun du bud med gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta na sdug pa ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-1: de la sems can de dag chags pa skyes nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-2: byugs shing kun tu byugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-4: de dag skyes bu de dag gi pang du son pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-5: rnyis shing bskams nas 'chi ba'i dus byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-6: mi gtsang zhing dri mi zhim par gyur pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-7: skyes bu de dag des yid byung nas por te song ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-8: shi ba'i ro de dag nyid las skyes bu de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de lta bu 'byung ngo; ;yang zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-9: byang chub sems dpa' de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lus kyis khyab par byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-10: sor mo'i rtse mos yungs 'bru la bya ba de bzhin du rin po che'i gdugs kyis khebs par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-11: sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me la lag pa'i sor mos g-yogs kyang de'i lus nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-12: de'i lus kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod cing rim gro byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-13: me tog gi gdugs ri rab tsam dag kyang 'bul lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:160b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi skon bu dag kyang 'thor ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di spos kyi 'bru mar gyis gang ba'i snod gcig @161a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-2: ri rab tsam gyi snying po 'bar bar byas pa'i mar me 'bar bar byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mar me 'bar bar byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus kyang ras bcos bus dkris nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-5: mar dang 'bru mar gyis bskus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-7: de 'bar bar gyur pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-8: sems can dag gis kyang mthong zhing shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa de mthong nas kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-10: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-13: dregs pas rlom pa'i sems can rnams la yang bdag gis gzugs tshan po che chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-15: lag na rdo rje'i gzugs su ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-16: der sems can de dag sprul pas 'jigs skrag nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-17: byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-18: de la chos kyang nyan par 'dod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161a-19: gang yang grong khyer chen po dag gi dur khrod chen po srog chags brgya stong du mas gang bar gyur pa de yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @161b des bdag gi lus chen po shi zhing dus las 'das par ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-1: der yang sems can dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis ci tsam du 'dod par sha la zos nas tshe'i mthar phyin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-3: shi nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-4: de yang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-5: de ni byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-6: bdag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-7: shi ba'i lus la sems can gang dag gis zos pa de dag la de nyid mtho ris su skye ba nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-8: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur gyur cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-9: ces yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-10: tshul khrims dang ldan pa de bsam pa 'grub /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-14: rnam grangs 'dis ci ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus tshad med cing mtha' yas par khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-16: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-17: 'dzam bu'i gling du gtogs pa nam mkhas bskor ba 'di nyid du grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong pa phrag bzhi byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-20: ri khrod stong phrag mang po srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po gnas pa yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:161b-23: nad chen po'i bskal pa par ma byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-1: nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-2: phal cher lus shu ba can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-9: bad kan gyi nad rnams kyis rgyas par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-10: de'i tshe sman pa stong phrag du ma sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur kyang; sems can de dag gi nad de bsal bar ma nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-11: der sems can de dag gis gso ba'i spyad ma rnyed de skyabs med rten med nas 'di skad du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-12: nad 'di las ni thar byed pa; ;lha'am klu'am dri za'am //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-13: gnod sbyin dang ni mi yang rung //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-14: mi ma yin pa su zhig yod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-15: sdug bsngal 'di las thar byed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-16: de la nor rnams thams cad btang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-17: rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-18: byas pa dag kyang gzo bar bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-21: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa 'di /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-22: de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig bzang zhes bya bar gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-23: des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can de dag nad sna tshogs mang pos btab pa yang mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-24: lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas ku co chen po 'don pa'i sgra yang thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-25: des de dag mthong zhing thos nas kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162a-26: snying rje chen po bskyed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-0: de 'di snyam du bdag ci nas @162b sems can gnas med pa 'di dag gi gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-2: rten med pa rnams kyi skyabs dang rten du 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas des de ma thag tu 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-3: grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba zhig yod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu srog chags des pa zhes bya bar rdzus te skyes nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-4: steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-5: 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams cad la tshigs su bcad pas bskul ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-6: ku ru'i grong khyer nye ba na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-7: srog chags des pa zhes bya yod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-8: de yi sha la sus zos pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-9: de ni nad las thar par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-10: 'jigs par ma byed skrag par ma byed par //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-11: ji ltar 'dod par de yi sha long zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-12: de la khro med gshe med gnod sems med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-13: 'dzam bu gling 'dir de ni sman yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-20: ri khrod de dag na sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-21: grong khyer chen po ku ru ga la ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-22: srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-23: srog chags des pa'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la sha zad par ma gyur nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-24: des pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-25: bden pa gang gis byang chub 'thob 'gyur zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-26: bdag gi ye shes zad par mi 'gyur ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:162b-27: bden pa des ni bdag gi lus las sha //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-1: nam yang zad par ma gyur cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-3: de ltar na phyogs bzhi'i sems can nad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa'i lus la sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus la bri ba'am gang bar yang mi mngon te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-5: yang bcad kyang phyir skye bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-7: de ltar sems can ji snyed kyis srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa'i sha zos pa de dag zos ma thag tu nad thams cad zhi bar gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-8: nad med cing bde ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-9: nyams pa med par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-10: de nas mthar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gyi nad thams cad bsal bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-12: de nas 'dzam bu gling gi skyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-15: bu mo dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-16: srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa des bdag cag nad las yongs su thar cing nad med par byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-17: bde zhing nyams pa med par byas kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-18: bdag cag gis de la mchod pa'i gnas shig bya'o snyam nas de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-19: srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa ga la ba der song nas thal mo sbyar te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-20: srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-21: khyod ni bdag cag gnas dang skyabs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-22: khyod ni bdag cag sman pa sman //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163a-23: khyod la mchod pa gang bgyi ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-0: khyod kyis bdag cag bka' @163b stsol cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-1: de nas srog chags kyi rnam pa des pas lus de mi snang bar byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-2: bdag brgya byin gyi lus su 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-3: nga la nor dang zas skom dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-4: gser dang 'bru rnams dgos pa med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-5: thams cad lhan cig mthun par ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-6: dge ba bcu yi las lam srungs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-7: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-8: byang chub smon lam brtan pa thob //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-9: phan pa'i dngos po nyid kyi sems //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-10: gcig la gcig kyang byams pa skyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-11: brgya byin las ni tshig 'di thos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-12: sems can de dag rab dga' ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-13: shin tu yongs su dag pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-14: dge ba bcu yi las lam blangs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-16: de ltar de tshud chad 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du skyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-19: bu mo de snyed las tha na sems can gcig kyang log par ltung bar song ba mi dran no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-20: de tshun chad de dag thams cad shi 'phos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-21: shi ba'i dus byas nas kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-22: bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-23: de dag yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-25: yang dag par gzengs bstod nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:163b-26: de la kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-0: kha cig gis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma @164a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-1: dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-3: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-4: lus kyi las yongs su dag pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-5: de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang bas na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-6: sems can tshad med pa grangs med pa dag yongs su smin par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-7: gzhan yang gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mi shigs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-14: lus de ni 'jig pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'jig go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-15: lus mi 'jig pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-16: 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir thams cad kyis thams cad du mi 'jig ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-18: mtshon gyis mi tshugs shing dngos po rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan te mi shigs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-20: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni lus kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' mi sems mi rtog ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-21: lus la lus kyis dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-22: lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-23: lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164a-24: chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gnyis su mi byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-0: lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi @164b mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-1: de ltar na dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'jug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-2: de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-3: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-4: de rang gi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-5: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid du shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-6: chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-7: chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rjes su 'thob bo; ;de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-8: sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-9: de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-10: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-11: de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-13: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-15: ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-18: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de phung po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:164b-20: skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-0: @165a *// skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-1: rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-2: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-3: rnam par byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de 'khor ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-4: mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-6: mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-7: mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-9: de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-11: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-14: rtsod pa med pa nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-16: de bzhin nyid la gzugs gang yang med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-17: gzugs med pa ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-18: ji ltar de bzhin nyid gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang gzugs med pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la gzugs de ston kyang de bzhin nyid gzugs su mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-20: de gzugs med cing rtsod pa med kyang lus dang gzugs thams cad kyang ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-21: de bzhin nyid kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165a-22: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-0: de bzhin gshegs @165b pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis bdag gi lus mnyam pa nyid la rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-1: lus ni shin tu ma skyes pa nyid yin pas lus thams cad ni lus med par yang dag par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-2: lus thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-3: shes nas kyang chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrub bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-4: de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs pas chos kyi sku nyid du 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-6: skye mched kyi lus ni ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-7: de chos kyi sku rab tu phye bas na mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-9: reg pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-13: sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rtsi thams cad bsdus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-14: rtsi'i shing mang po las bu mo'i gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-15: blta na sdug pa legs par byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-16: legs par zin cing legs par byi dor byas pa de 'ong ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-20: nyal yang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-21: der nad pa gang btsun pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-23: rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-28: rgyal phran gang dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:165b-29: de dag phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad byang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-1: gzhan la med pa sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba'i shes pa la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yang sems can bud med dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-8: gti mug gis yongs su gdungs pa ji snyed yod pa de dag gis lus la reg na reg ma thag tu de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-9: lus yongs su gdung ba dang bral bar yang shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-10: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam shin tu dag pa'i phyir ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-12: chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-13: 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-15: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus ni zas skom gyis bskyed pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-16: kham gyis za ba'i zas kyis kyang lus 'tsho ba ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-17: de zas thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-18: de zas za'ang mid pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-19: za'ang khong du 'jug par mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-20: chos kyi sku'i stobs kyis mi nyams /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-21: yongs su mi nyams so; ;zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166a-22: byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku dang ldan pa la skye ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-0: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skye ba dang @166b 'chi 'pho dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-2: de 'chi 'pho yang chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho med cing mngon par 'du byed pa med par rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-3: 'byung yang chos thams cad la 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-4: skye yang chos thams cad la skye ba med par rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-5: de chos kyi sku dang ldan /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-7: chos kyi stobs dang ldan zhing chos la rton pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-11: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-12: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-13: sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-18: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-19: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-20: rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-21: rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-22: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang ma 'brel ba'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-25: chu zla'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-26: stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-27: smon pa med pa la nges par btags pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-28: phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i nam mkha' khyab pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-29: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-30: mtha' yas mu med pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-31: 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-32: mi g-yo zhing rlom sems med pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:166b-35: mi g-yo ba thob pa'i sku /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-5: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i sku ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-6: sa'i khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-9: rlung gi khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-12: 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa'o; ;'byung ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-14: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-16: rna ba la mi gnas pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-17: snas shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-18: lces rab tu ma phye ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-19: lus dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-20: yid kyis nye bar sprad pa ma yin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-22: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mi 'jug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni de 'dra'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-27: de las byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid thob nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa la spyod cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-28: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-34: pho brang 'khor de ji snyed yod pa thams cad du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167a-35: byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar yang byed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-0: bdud thams cad @167b kyis mi mthong bar yang snang bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-1: de mthong bar yang byed la mthong bar snang ba yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-2: mthong bar mi byed pas kyang mthong bar snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-6: rnam par rig pas rab tu phye ba yang ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-7: sems can yongs su smin par bya bas rab tu phye ba yin yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-8: lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa las kyang mi nyams yongs su mi nyams so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-9: de lus mi rtag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-11: lus bdag med par yang sems can rnams la ston la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-12: lus kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-13: de lus rab tu dbye ba yang sems can rnams la ston la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-14: rgyu gang dang dmigs pa gang dag gis lus mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-15: dmigs pa de dag kyang byed pa po med pa dang; tshor ba po med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-20: mig yor lta bur yang rab tu shes shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-21: de lus kyi las yongs su dag par yang sems can rnams la ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-23: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-25: lus kyi las yongs su dag pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-26: de bas lhag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las yongs su dag pa bskal pa brgya stong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:167b-27: de bas kyang lhag par bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-1: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bstan kyang zad par mi 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gsang ba bstan pa ni de tsam du tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-3: des pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-4: bam po gnyis pa; gzhan yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-6: de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gsang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-7: ngag gi las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-9: sems can rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs kyang de snyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs ji snyed par sgra la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-11: sems can de dag gi sgra brjod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-12: tshig gi lam brjod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-16: yang dag par smra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-20: sdug bsngal brjod pa ji snyed pa'i sgra la 'jug pa de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168a-25: phye ma leb kyi sgra dag la'ang ye shes mthong ba 'jug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-0: sgra'i rnam par @168b rig pa bsgrags pa ji lta bus sems can de dag gi lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-1: sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra'i rnam par rig pa bsgrags pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i kha'i sgo nas 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-2: 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-4: ji ltar sems can mtha' ma gang yang med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-5: de ltar skyes pa'i rabs te dpag tu med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-6: bskal pa brgya snyed bshad kyang mtha' ma med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-7: bsam yas de dag ji ltar bshad par bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-8: skyon rnams med pa bdag nyid che ba'i tshig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-9: sems dang bsam pa rgya cher rab ston pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-10: nam mkha' lta bur gang med bri med pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-11: 'on kyang dpe don ldan pa bshad par bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-14: brgya byin gyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-15: 'jig rten skyong gi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-23: lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-24: sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad du 'byin pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-25: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-26: de la 'di skad ces bya ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-27: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis ma smad tshig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-28: gang pa med cing bri med nam mkha' bzhin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:168b-29: sems dang bsam pa rgya chen bstan pa dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-1: brjod pa rnams la nan tan nyon //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-2: byams la sbyor dang snying rjer 'jug pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-3: dga' ba dang ni btang snyoms rab bshad de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-4: tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i sgra phyung bas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-5: legs bshad des ni tshangs pa tshim par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-6: gang dag brgya byin rol mo yid 'ong sgra //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-7: de dag de yi sgra brjod zil gyis non //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-8: rol mo sgra dbyangs byung ba de las ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-9: chos rnams rab tu dbye ba dpag med 'byung //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-10: mi'am ci yi sgra dag gang yod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-11: de bas de yi sgra mchog phun sum tshogs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-12: de ni 'dod chags 'bar bar mi byed de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-13: de yi tshig gis mi ci dga' bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-14: 'dod pa'i khams na yid 'ong sgra yod pas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-15: rol mo'i sgra dang lha yi sgra mang po //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-16: chos kyi don sbyor dge bar ldan pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-17: de yi tshig gis kun du tshim par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-18: mi yi 'dren pa yi ni tshig thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-19: 'dod chags zhi zhing zhe sdang rab tu zhi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-20: gti mug g-yo dang nga rgyal dregs pa zhi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-21: don rnams gtan la phebs shing the tshom med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-22: gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang gnas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-23: de dag yid ni de yis tshim par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-24: mi yi gtso bo'i tshig rnams thos nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-25: 'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur zhes byang chub tshol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-26: klu dbang dri za lto 'phye che rnams kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-27: rol mo sna tshogs sgra yod de dag pas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-28: yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i sgra bsgrags pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169a-29: thams cad rab tu dga' ba rgya chen byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-0: @169b 'dzam gling 'di na tha dad phyogs rnams su //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-1: kun nas sgra skad mtha' yas gyur mod kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-2: de yi skad kyi rnam par bsgrags gyur na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-3: de thos mi rnams thar pa rjes su thob //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-4: sa bla'i lha dang de bzhin bar snang lha //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-5: de dag sgra skad 'jug pa ci 'dra ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-6: de ltar de la de yi sgra yang 'jug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-7: rnam par nges bden gtam yang de 'dra'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-8: ngang pa khrung khrung ka la ping ka dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-9: rma bya ne tso khu byug shang shang te'u //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-10: ri skegs dang ni ngur pa kun la kun //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-11: ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-12: stag dang seng ge de bzhin dom dang spre'u //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-13: gzig dang byi la ri dvags glang chen bse //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-14: rta dang khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa kun //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-15: ji lta'i skad kyis des ni tshim par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-16: gang dag rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-17: rkang mang dang ni de bzhin rkang med rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-18: bskul dang chad pas bcad dang phan gdags phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-19: kun la de yi sgra skad shes pa 'jug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-20: sems can gang dag stong gsum 'jig rten na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-21: rab bam 'bring ngam 'on te tha ma'am //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-22: dmyal pa dud 'gro'i gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-23: lha mi rnams dang de ni skad kyang mthun //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-24: ji ltar rigs par byed pa ston kyang ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-25: mi sems 'du shes med cing rtog pa med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-26: mtshan ma med cing 'dzin med 'ching ba med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-27: mnyam par bzhag pas sems ni 'khrug pa med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-28: dag pa'i sems can gal te 'dod na yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:169b-29: de la 'bad dang sems 'dzin med par ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-0: @170a *// bye ba'i zhing dang de yi gong du yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-1: gangg'a'i bye snyed dbyangs kyis go bar byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-2: stong gsum 'jig rten bdud gang ci yod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-3: de dag de yi 'jigs chen sgra thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-4: chung mar bcas te 'jigs skrag la gor du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-5: thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-6: sems can gang dag rab tu sma 'dod dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-7: nga rgyal zil gnon su la'ang mi 'dud pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-8: de dag de yi gsal ba'i tshig thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-9: thal mo sbyar te gus par 'dud par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-10: 'on pa glen pa dag dang lce med dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-11: dig pa rnams dang gang dag skad 'dzer ba; ;de dag de yi legs smras snyan thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-12: sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-13: nyon mongs gdungs shing nyon mongs gzir ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-14: nyes pa'i 'gyod pa brgya yis dkris pa rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-15: de dag de yis dge tshig dag thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-16: 'gyod pa brtul bar gyur cing bsil bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-17: sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun sgra //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-18: mi rtag sgra thos nas ni sems can rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-19: sbyin dang thos dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-20: brtson 'grus bsam gtan blo gros rtsom par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-21: sangs rgyas dbyangs dang bar med gang gnas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-22: mtha' yas dbyangs ldan mtha' yas ye shes can //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-23: de dag rnams kyi yon tan thams cad ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170a-24: bskal pa bye mang brjod kyang zad mi nus //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni @170b chags pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-17: nyon mongs pa sna tshogs pag la nyal ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-23: dus ma yin par smra ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-25: sdug pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-44: bdag dang pha rol gdung bar byed pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-45: tshig blang bar 'os pa ma yin pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-46: tshig gzung bar 'os pa ma yin pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:170b-48: rigs pa'i tshig ma yin pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-8: lung bstan pa la thogs pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-11: rnyed pas rnyed par 'dod pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-12: 'byung ba ma yin pa ston pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-16: sdug par byed pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-17: mi sdug cing gnad du 'debs pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-18: khyad du gsod pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-19: rang gi phyogs bstan pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-20: gzhan gyi phyogs tshar gcad pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-21: bdag bstod pa la rjes su chags pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-22: gzhan gyi bstod pa la bar du gcod pa'i tshig smra ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-25: gzhan la rab tu rlom pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-26: bya ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-28: ngag bsrungs pa ma yin pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-29: mkhas pas smad pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-30: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i tshig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:171a-32: ngor mngon du bstod pa'i tshig gam /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:173a-16: gtso bo khyod kyis skad cig mkhyen //
