K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:175b-20: rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:175b-21: de la rjes su rtogs par bya ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:175b-22: rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs pas de'i phyir rjes su rtogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:175b-23: rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:175b-25: 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-0: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i @176a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-2: gang byams pa yang yin la bdag med pa nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-3: snying rje yang yin la sems can med pa nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-4: dga' ba yang yin la srog med pa nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-6: gang zag med pa nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-7: sbyin pa yang yin la sems dul ba nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-8: tshul khrims kyang yin la sems zhi ba nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-9: bzod pa yang yin la sems mi zad pa nyid kyang yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-10: brtson 'grus kyang yin la sems dben pa nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-11: bsam gtan yang yin la sems nges par sems pa nyid kyang yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-12: shes rab kyang yin la rgyu ba med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-13: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang yin la dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin; yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-14: yang dag par sems mnyam pa nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-15: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-16: spros pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-17: dad pa yang yin la chags pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-18: brtson 'grus kyang yin la lhun gyis grub pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-19: dran pa yang yin la rang 'byung gi sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-20: ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la mnyam pa nyid shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176a-21: shes rab kyi dbang po yang yin la dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-0: dbang po rnams @176b kyang yin la chos thams cad la dbang po med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-1: stobs rnams kyang yin la mi rdzi ba'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-2: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yin la blos rab tu 'byed pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-3: lam bsgom pa nyid kyang yin la bsgom pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-4: zhi gnas kyang yin la sems nye bar zhi ba nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-5: lhag mthong yang yin la rjes su mi mthong ba'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-6: 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa la yang yin la shin tu yongs su shes pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-7: sangs rgyas yid la byed pa yang yin la yid la byed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-8: chos yid la byed pa yang yin la chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-9: dge 'dun yid la byed pa yang yin la mi gnas pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-10: sems can yongs su smin par yang byed la bzod ma nas dag pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-11: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang yin la; chos kyi dbyings dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-12: dbyer med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-14: sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-15: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yang yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-16: mi dmigs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:176b-17: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang yin la ldog pa dang 'jug pa med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-0: mtshan rab tu thob pa yang @177a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-1: yin la mtshan ma med pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-2: byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan nyid kyang yin la khams gsum gyi snying po'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-3: bdud tshar gcod pa yang yin la sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-4: byang chub kyang yin la chos thams cad ni dngos po med par khong du chud pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-5: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yin la mi 'jug mi ldog pa'i sems nyid kyang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-6: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston la 'khor ba'i rang bzhin dang mnyam pa'i sems nyid kyang yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-8: 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-9: sems kyi las yongs su dag pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-10: sems dag pa des sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su dag par rtogs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-11: sems can thams cad kyi sems la byang chub kyi sems de rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-12: byang chub kyi sems de la sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang snang bar gyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-16: nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-17: thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-19: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177a-20: thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-0: @177b gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-2: sems kyi gsang ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-3: lha dang mi'i skye dgu'i srog chags las /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-4: stong phrag bdun khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-6: srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-7: dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-10: steng gi bar snang las kyang me tog gi char mngon par bab po //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-11: ma bskyod par sil snyan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-12: rol mo'i sgra stong snyed rab tu grags par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-14: rol mo'i sgra de dag las kyang gang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di nyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-15: thos nas kyang 'dzin cing mos par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-18: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-19: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sems can de dag ni byang chub kyi sems la rmongs pa med pa'i bsam pa dang ldan te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:177b-20: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang ldan pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-1: ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par rig par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis nye bar brtan pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-3: sems can de dag ni sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-4: sems can de dag ni lung bstan pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-5: zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-10: rol mo'i sgra las 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba khyod kyis thos sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-14: 'di lta bu'i sgra byung ba de su'i mthu lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-17: 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams sprin ldan zhes bya ba na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-18: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal po zhes bya ba'i drung nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba nga la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178a-23: lag na rdo rjes bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang mnyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag la @178b yang blta ba'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba de lus mi snang bar steng gi bar snang la gnas nas; nga dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog char mngon par 'bebs shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-5: rol mo'i sgra yang rab tu phyung nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-7: rol mo'i sgra de dag las sgra 'di lta bu byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring por ma lon par /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bar snang de las babs nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-11: lan brgya stong bskor ba byas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dbyangs rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-17: nyam nga ba nyung ngam; bskyod pa yang ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-18: stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-19: yang bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-21: sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba'i bdag pos bstan pa chen po 'di bstan to zhes gsung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:178b-23: 'di 'dra ba'i spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa thob par rngo thogs lags sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-1: ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-2: rigs kyi bu khyod legs par 'ongs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-4: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u gsang ba pa'i bdag po las thos par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-5: sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-6: de nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig la 'dis bsnyen bskur byas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-9: 'dis smon lam ci 'dra ba zhig btab na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-10: gang phyir 'di 'dra ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-12: byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa; zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-13: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-14: rgya chen po tshad med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179a-16: dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-0: bskal pa mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @179b pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-4: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par brgyan pa de yang 'byor pa rgyas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-11: lha dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-12: lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-13: gseg ma dang gyo mo med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-14: rtsva dag der skyes pa yang 'jam po /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-15: gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-16: rma bya'i mgrin pa ltar sngo zhing g-yung drung 'khyil bar g-yas su 'khyil ba kha dog dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-17: dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-18: gom pa bor na sor bzhi thur du dma' ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-19: rkang pa bteg na sor bzhi gyen du mthob /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-21: ha cang mi tsha ba'i rlung chung ngu bsil ba 'dod pa dang mthun par ldang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-22: sa chen po de yang bee d'ur+ya sngon pos brgyan pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-23: sems can de rnams kyang rnam pa bzang zhing mkhas pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-27: nyon mongs pa thams cad chung ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:179b-28: legs par bshad pa'i don kun shes par byed nus pa'i mthu dang ldan pa sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-0: bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de @180a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-1: bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun ni khrag khrig bcu gnyis yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-3: de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug thub bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-4: mi rnams kyang dus ma yin par glo bur bu 'chi ba med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus na rnam par brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na mdzes par snang ba zhes bya ba gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten par ma rab tu 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-8: yangs shing tha gru che ba byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-9: gling bzhi pa re re yang dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-10: der grong khyer chen po yang bar bar na dpag tshad gcig yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-13: ri khrod stong gis bskor ba byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-15: gling bzhi pa mdzes par snang ba de'i dbus na pho brang grong khyer rnam par dag pa can zhes bya ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-16: byang dang lhor ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-17: shar dang nub tu ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-18: skyed mos tshal khris rab tu brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-21: ri khrod khris kun nas bskor ba yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-23: rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par dag pa can zhes bya ba der /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-24: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung zhes bya ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180a-25: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-0: gling @180b bzhi pa la dbang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-1: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-3: bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-6: rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi grong khyer gyi dbus na khang pa rgya che zhing yangs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-7: chu zhing du dpag tshad bcu drug yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-8: rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim bdun dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-10: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba brtsigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-11: ra ba'i nang na skyed mos tshal chen po bzhi byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-13: me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-14: yon tan gyis mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-15: rma byas mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-16: dus kyi bde ba zhes bya ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-17: rdzing khyon dpag tshad phyed pa rin po che'i kha khyer gyis kun nas bskor ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-18: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi glegs ma'i 'bab stegs can /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-19: gser gyi bye ma bdal ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-20: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-21: rin po che'i pad mas kun nas khebs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-25: ngur ba dag sgra 'byin pa bzhi byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-27: dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-28: dga' mchog ces bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-29: spos mchog ces bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-30: chu rgyun rjes su 'bab pa zhes bya ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:180b-32: rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor bdun 'bum yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-0: thams cad kyang mtshan dang ldan @181a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-1: pa'i na chung bud med rin po che'i longs spyod dang 'dra ba sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-2: de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rab tu zhugs par gyur pa dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-3: de la bu stong du tshang ba yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-6: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-7: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-8: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-9: lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na; bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du rten cing bzhugs te; rgyal po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-16: yul 'khor gyi mis bsti stang byas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-21: rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu lo bye ba tshang bar yid du 'ong ba'i bza' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181a-25: 'chag sa'i longs spyod kyis bsnyen bkur byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-0: dge slong re @181b re la yang rim gro pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-1: spyod pa'i phyir g-yog gsum gsum phul lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-3: rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la bsti stang bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-4: mchod pa bya bar mos pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-5: chos nyan pa don du gnyer bas bag yod par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-6: 'dod pa'i yon tan don du mi gnyer ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-7: de dag bag yod cing dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-8: sems kyis nges par sems pas ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-9: de dag bskyed nas steng gi bar snang las ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-10: grong khyer nas grong khyer dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-12: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mthar gyis rgyu zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-13: sangs rgyas 'byung ba brgya lam rnyed par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-14: mir skye ba yang shin tu dka' bas rnyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-15: grogs po gang dag dad dang chos mnyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-16: 'di 'dra bskal pa brgyar yang rnyed par dka'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-17: mi dbang rgyal po de ni da byung ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-18: rab tu zhi bar 'gro ba'i chos ston gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-19: bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du myur du deng //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-20: chos thos nas ni bde 'gror 'gro bar gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-21: chos thos pas ni ngan 'gro rnam par spong //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-22: chos thos pas ni bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-23: chos thos pas ni nyon mongs rnams kyang zhi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:181b-24: bsil ba'i dngos po dam pa thob par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-0: de dag tshigs bcad 'di dag rab brjod @182a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-2: sa 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-3: lha rnams aa la la zhes lan brgya smras //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-4: lha yi me tog yid 'ong char du bab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-5: ston pa blta phyir gang dag bskul ba rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-6: rkang gnyis mchog gi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-7: de dag thal sbyar gus bcas 'khor gyur pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-8: de dag bgrang las dpag par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-9: rgyal bas de dag rnams kyi bsam mkhyen nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-10: de dang mthun pa'i chos ni rab tu bshad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-11: bde bar gshegs las chos thos bye ba phrag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-12: sum cu rtsa drug byang chub mchog la zhugs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-13: bye ba brgya phrag gsum tshang mi nyung ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-14: de dag chos mchog mig ni rnam par dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-15: srid pa kun tu yid byung sems gyur na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-16: de dag der ni bstan 'dir rab tu byung //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-17: gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig de nyid du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-18: bslab pa bzung zhing de bzhin gso sbyong blangs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-19: ston la mchod pa byas shing chos mnyan nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-20: de dag slar yang rang gi gnas su dong //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-22: de ltar rgyal bu gzhon du de dag gis pha yul 'khor srung la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-23: lha'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-24: rgya che zhing yangs pa'i bkod pas legs par brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-25: ba gam dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182a-27: kha khyer gyis bskor ba zhig byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-0: 'dzam bu'i gling ril gyis kyang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po srang phyed kyi rin du mi chog @182b pa de lta bu'i tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya che zhing yangs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-1: chu zheng du dpag tshad bcu yod pa rnam par bkra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-5: shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig byas par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-6: de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-7: nam bcom ldan 'das nyid la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-11: chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-12: pha rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-13: rgyal bu gzhon nu de rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-17: khang pa brtsegs pa der zhugs nas padma'i bkod pa'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-18: bla mar bya ba chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-30: rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-33: rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len pa'i mchod pa dam pa dang bcas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-34: khang pa brtsegs pa de ni rin po che'i dra bas rab tu g-yogs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:182b-35: thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas khang ba brtsegs pa de sprul te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-0: steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa med par bcom ldan 'das yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der @183a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-2: khang pa brtsegs pa de sa la bzhag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-3: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-4: dge slong gi dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-5: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-6: rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-7: gnyen gyi 'khor kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de las babs nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-8: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-10: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-11: chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-12: gnyen gyi 'khor du bcas te 'dug go ///
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal pos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-15: rgyal po yul 'khor srung chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs par mkhyen nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-16: chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-19: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-20: de la bcom ldan 'das de'i chos kyi gtam ni 'di yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-21: rgyal po chen po; chos bzhi po 'di dag ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183a-22: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams yongs su mi nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-0: @183b dad pa ni yongs su mi nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-1: dad pa de gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-2: dad pa gang gis 'phags pa'i drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-3: bya ba ma yin pa mi byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-5: gus pa ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-6: gus pa gang gis 'phags pa rnams kyi legs par bshad pa rnams gus par nyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-7: rna ba blags te chos nyan pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-9: nga rgyal med pa ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-10: nga rgyal med pa gang gis 'phags pa rnams la mngon par 'dud pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-14: brtson 'grus ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-15: brtson 'grus gang gis lus yang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-17: bya ba thams cad kyang nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-19: chos bzhi po de dag ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-20: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams yongs su mi nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o; ;rgyal po chen po /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-22: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams 'gyod pa med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-23: bag yod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-26: 'dod pa rnams la skyon du blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:183b-27: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-0: chos la nges par sems pa ni srog gi dbang @184a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-3: chos bzhi po de dag ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-4: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams 'gyod pa med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-5: bag yod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-8: rgyal po la chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-10: byang chub kyi sems rjes su mi gtong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-11: gzhan dag kyang byang chub la yang dag par 'dzud pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-13: sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid mthong ngam thos na sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la mos pa ma gtogs par lha dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-16: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi che ba nyid la mngon par dga' ba ma yin pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-18: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-19: rgyal po la chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-21: de lta bas na khyod rtag par bag yod par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-24: chos don du gnyer ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-25: chos kyis kun dga' la dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-27: khyod chos yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-28: chos 'dod par bya'i yul la chags par mi bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-31: 'dod pa rnams la chog pa med pa'i phyir te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-32: gang dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ngoms pa de dag ni ngoms pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184a-34: mi rnams kyi srog ni thung ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-0: @184b tshe'i tshad kyang thung ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-1: tshe rabs 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-2: khyod 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par blta bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-4: khyod kyis gang de bzhin gshegs pa la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-6: rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de khyod kyis yongs su bsngo ba bzhis yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-8: longs spyod mi zad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-10: spobs pa mi zad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-11: ye shes mi zad pa ste bzhi po de dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-14: tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyis lus yongs su dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-15: thos pa'i chogs kyis dag yongs su dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-16: shes rab kyi tshogs kyis sems yongs su dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-17: ye shes kyi tshogs kyis shes rab yongs su dag pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-20: bzhi gang zhe na sems can yongs su smin par byed pas thabs yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-21: bdud tshar gcod pas shes rab yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-22: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pas smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-23: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang phrad pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po yul 'khor srung la chos kyi gtam des yang dag par bstan /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-27: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:184b-28: tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-0: @185a *// rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-1: rin thang med pa'i mu tig gi do shal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-2: yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir rgyal srid thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de la phul lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-3: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-4: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-5: btsun mo'i 'khor de thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-6: lnga pa tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-7: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang mnos so; ;rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi gtam thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-8: rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-10: gos dang rgyan ci thogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-11: mngon par gsol nas kyang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du lnga tshangs par spyod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-12: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-14: de ltar rgyal po yul 'khor srung chos kyi rnyed pa phun sum tshogs pas rnyed pa chen po dang ldan nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185a-16: gnyen gyi 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-0: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas @185b te; steng gi bar snang gi nam mkha' las khang pa brtsegs pa de nyid nas rgyal po'i pho brang rnam par dag pa can du slar 'khor nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-1: rang gi khyim du phyin to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-3: de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung dus gzhan zhig na zla ba nya ba'i tshe me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal gyi sa bzang po blta ba'i phyir song nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-4: de skyed mos tshal chen po de na gnas shing; sil snyan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-6: rol mo'i sgra rab tu len pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-7: rtse ba'i dam pa rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-8: chung ma dam par ma smad pa zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-9: dpe med ma zhes bya ba de gnyis rdzing dga' ba zhes bya bar khrus byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-10: spos chus gos brlan nas seng ge'i khri padma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-11: de gnyis der 'dug pa'i pang pa nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-12: rgyal bu gzhon nu gzugs bzang po /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-15: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gnyis skyil mo krung bcas par rdzus te byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-16: khye'u de gnyis byung ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la steng gi bar snang las lha rnams kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni chos sems pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-17: kye ma khye'u 'di ni chos kyi blo gros so zhes sgra byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-19: de ltar 'jig rten du khye'u de gnyis chos sems pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-20: chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:185b-21: de la khye'u chos sems pa ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-0: btsun mo ma smad pa'i pang pa nas @186a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-3: btsun mo dpe med pa'i pang pa nas byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-4: khye'u de gnyis byung ma thag tu skyil mo krung ma nyams par gnyi gas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-5: gang dag byang chub tu ni sems bskyed cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-6: 'jig rten mgon po yul du byung ba la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-7: rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-8: de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed grogs po dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-9: gang zhig byang chub sems ni ma brjed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-10: de ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i gting nas phyin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-11: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo las ni yid kyang log /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-12: sems can rgya chen rnams kyis legs par gsungs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-13: steng gi phyogs na yan lag ma smad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-14: 'dren pa mtshan ni dus dpog rgyal po ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-15: de nas bdag cag chos don gnyer ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-16: 'jig mgon yon tan 'byung gnas blta phyir mchis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-17: khye'u de gnyis skyil mo krung bshig nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-18: de yi tshe na ma yi pang nas babs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-19: yul 'khor srung po ga lar de gnyis dong //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-20: rkang par phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar te 'dug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-21: yab gcig bdag cag mchi ba gsan du gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-22: bskal pa bye bar chos rnyed rab tu dka'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-23: de rnyed nas ni byang chub ma thob bar //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-24: mkhas pa dag ni gzhar yang mi gtong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-25: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rtag tu rab rnyed dka'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186a-26: pha ma dag ni chos la gnas pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-0: dal ba 'byor dang chos 'dod grogs po @186b dang; ;mthun par gnas dang bstan la dad rab dkon //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-1: 'dun dang brtson 'grus de bzhin bag yod dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-2: rab tu byung thob rtag tu shes bzhin can //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-3: phan pa'i dngos dang mnyen dang ma khengs dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-4: ngo tsha khrel yod thos dang tshul khrims bzang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-5: zhi dul spog chags rnams la snying rje byams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-6: zab mo'i chos la chos kyi bzod ldan dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-7: brtson 'grus mthu dang sems ni ma zhum dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-8: bsdu bas sems can yongs su smin byed dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-9: sems las rung zhing dpen par gnas pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-10: lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-11: mgo dang gos la 'bar ltar chos sems pa; ;de dag sangs rgyas yon tan de 'dra thob //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-12: bdag cag chos mchog gang dag rab brjid pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-13: chos mchog de dag yab gcig rab rnyed dka'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-14: chos rnams de dag don du bdag cag lhags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-15: da ni rgyal po'i drung du bzhud par bgyid //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-16: dkar po'i chos rnams kyis ni yongs zin cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-17: skad cig gis ni mngon shes lnga thob pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-18: rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing ye shes can //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-19: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de gnyis dong //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-20: rgyal po bu dang bcas shing bud med bcas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-21: byang chub sems dpa' mngon shes thob mkhas gnyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-22: ston pa yon tan rgyal mchog ga la bar //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-23: nam mkha' la ni der yang mngon du dong //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:186b-25: thams cad 'dus nas gus dang bcas par gnas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-0: de nas rgyal sras chos kyi blo gros @187a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-2: byang chub lam de bdag cag bshad du gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-3: rgyal pas de dag rnams kyi bsam mkhyen nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-4: zab mo'i chos kyi gtam ni rab gsungs pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-5: chos rnams 'di dag rten nas byung ba ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-6: bdag po med cing byed pa po dang bral //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-7: nang yang stong zhing phyi rol rgyu ba med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-8: chos rnams 'di dag srog dang gsob yin te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-9: lha dang bya ba dag cing g-yo ba med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-10: nam mkha' lta bur rtag tu gzung du med //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-11: bde bar gshegs pas chos gtam rnam dag pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-12: rnam pa mang po de dag rnams la bshad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-13: bye ba phrag gsum khrag khrig bdun cu drug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-14: mi skye bzod pa rjes su thob par gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-16: de ltar bcom ldan 'das de la rgyal bu yul 'khor srung gis zhag bdun gyi bar du mchod pa byas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-19: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rang gi khyim du slar phyin to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-21: de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung gcig pu dpen par song ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-22: bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri padma'i 'byung gnas bzang po la 'dug nas nang du yang dag bzhag cing 'di snyam du sems te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187a-23: bdag gi gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-0: gzhon nu 'di dag thams cad kyi nang na gang thog mar bla na @187b med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba bdag gis brtag go snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-1: de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis de'i mod la rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa byed du bcug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-2: byi dor legs par byas shing legs par zin par bya ba nas gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyi ming bris te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-3: bum pa de'i nang na bcug nas rin po che sna bdun gyi padma sna tshogs blta na sdug pa byas nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-4: padma de'i steng du bum pa de bzhag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-5: zhag bdun du lha'i mchod pa me tog thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-10: rol mo'i sil snyan thams cad kyis mchod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-11: ming de dag mchod pa'i tshe na lha'i bu khri mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-12: zhag bdun du mchod pa byas nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-14: gzhon nu de gnyis kyi mdun du ril gyis gser las byas pa'i khri'u bzang po'i steng du bum pa de bzhag nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-15: nang gi mis bum pa de'i nang nas ming de rnams phyung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-17: de'i tshe thams cad kyi thog mar rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba de'i ming byung bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:187b-18: ming de byung ma thag tu smad cig de nyid las chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-0: btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyi pang na sil snyan yod pa de dag kyang ma @188a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-1: dkrol bye ba phrag du ma'i sgra byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na thams cad kyi thog mar ming byung ba rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan yin par de ltar mi blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-8: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-9: bcom ldan 'das gser thub de de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-10: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-11: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-12: rgyal bu gzhon nu dbang po zhi ba zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-13: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ngo; ;de ni nga yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-15: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu ska rags can zhes bya ba'i ming byung bar gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-16: de ni byams pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188a-17: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu mchog gi blo gros zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-0: de ni seng ge zhes @188b bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-1: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu glog gi lha zhes bya ba de'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-2: de ni tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-3: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bzang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-4: de ni me tog dam pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-5: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-6: de ni me tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-7: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par snang ba'i padma zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-8: de ni skar ma rgyal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-9: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-10: de ni spyan legs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-11: de'i 'og rgyal bu gzhon nu rdul med ces bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-12: de ni lag bzang zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-13: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu blo gros rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-14: de ni 'od ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-15: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dge ba bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-16: de ni skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:188b-17: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu phyogs 'phyor pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-1: pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-2: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rnam par dag pa bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-3: de ni yon tan gyi mchog mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-4: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu dpal sbas zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-5: de ni nor dpal zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-6: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu lus shin tu rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-7: de ni ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-8: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu drag shul can zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-9: de ni rin po che 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-10: de'i 'og tu rgyal bu gzhon nu rin chen grags pa zhes bya ba'i ming byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-11: de ni kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-12: de bzhin du rgya cher bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-14: de ltar bu stong yod pa de'i nang nas gcig bzhag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-15: rgyal bu gzhon nu cod pan brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ming gi bar du byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-16: de ni yon tan mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189a-18: de'i tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung blo mtha' yas zhes bya ba de'i ming byung bar gyur pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-0: snag gi @189b gnyen mtshams thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-2: gang gi tshe bdag cag thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byas shing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byas pa de'i 'og tu khyod kyis ci zhig byar yod ces spyos pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-3: blo gros mtha' yas kyis smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-4: sangs rgyas chos rnams 'di dag nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-5: bdag gi yid la sems can zad pa med snyam bgyid //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-6: tshul khrims kyis ni bdag gi smon lam 'di dag gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-7: bdag gi smon lam ci 'dra thams cad 'dir gson cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-8: khyed kyi tshe tshad ji tsam pa dag bsdoms pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-9: tshogs kyi rgyal po ji snyed de dag kun bsdoms pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-10: thams cad bsdoms pa de snyed bdag gi tsher gyur te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-11: bdag gi dge slong tshogs kyang de kun ma lus snyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-12: de yis tshigs su bcad pa de ni smras ma thag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-13: de yi tshe na legs zhes lha yis sgra phyung ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-14: sems can dag pa khyod kyi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-15: khyod kyis ji ltar bsam bzhin sems can don mdzod cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-17: de ltar rgyal bu gzhon nu thams cad kyi tha chung du gyur pa blo mtha' yas zhes bya ba de ni bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma pa mos pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te; zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:189b-18: bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi che'i tshad ji tsam pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-0: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyed par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa @190a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-1: mos pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang de srid du 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-2: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-3: bdag de ltar mos pa na de'i phyir mos pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-5: 'di ltar sangs rgyas stong du gcig gis mtshang ba dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji snyed mdzad pa de snyed de bzhin gshegs pa mos pas byed par 'gyur bas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-6: thabs mkhas pa'i tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i khyad par la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-8: de nas gzhon nu stong po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu chos sems pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-9: chos kyi blo gros de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-10: rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyis smon lam ji lta bu zhig btab /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-13: bdag ni khyed thams cad kyi lag na rdo rjer gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-14: nang na spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad las phyi rol du ma gyur la; phyi nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-16: rtogs pa de ltar bdag smon lam 'debs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-17: chos kyi blo gros kyis smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-18: snag gi gnyen mtshams dag; bgres rabs dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190a-19: bdag ni khyed rnams thams cad kyis byang chub thob pa na chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-0: bdag gis bskul bas khyed thams cad kyis @190b chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'di ltar 'debs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-2: de gnyis kyang smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-3: bcom ldan 'das des lung bstan par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur pa de khyod kyis gzhan yin par de ltar mi blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-7: bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-9: de'i bu gzhon nu stong yod pa de dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa sha stag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig nas bzung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa zhes bya ba'i bar dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nur gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-13: btsun mo ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i pang pa nas rdzus te byung ba'i khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos sems pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-16: btsun mo dpe med ma zhes bya ba'i pang pa nas rdzus te byung ba'i khye'u chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba de ni tshangs pa gtsug phud can 'di yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:190b-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos kyi blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-0: rgyal po yul 'khor srung gi btsun mo'i 'khor du gyur pa @191a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-1: gang yin pa de dag ni 'khor 'dir 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-2: rgyal bu gzhon nu de rnams kyis sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-3: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-4: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la mthar gyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-6: 'di ltar skyes bu dam pa de dag gis bsam pa thams cad 'byor pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems bskyed pa chud mi za brten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mi 'gal ba la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-7: yul 'khor srung gi sngon gyi tshul gyi le'u ste lnga ba'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-9: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyis sems can chen po de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-10: tshig lhur blang bar mi bya'i /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-11: byang chub kyi lam la mngon par brtson pas bsgrub pa snying por bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-12: de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-14: byams pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems bskyed pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-15: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191a-17: bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-0: tshangs @191b pa'i gnas bzhi bsgrub pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-1: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-2: mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba yongs su skong pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-3: thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi tshogs gsog pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-4: 'di ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-6: gzhan yang byang chub kyi lam ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-10: lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-14: sgrib pa med pa nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-18: sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa nyid yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-19: lam de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'byor pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-20: lam de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bde bar 'gro'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-21: lam de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gnod pa med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-22: lam de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyun chad med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-23: lam de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas mi 'khrugs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-24: lam de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par rtogs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-25: lam de ni byams pa chen pos 'byung ba shes pa'i rjes su song pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-26: lam de ni snying rje chen pos phyir mi ldog pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-27: lam de ni dga' ba chen pos mchog tu dga' bar byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:191b-28: lam de ni btang snyoms chen pos snying po'i rjes su song ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-3: 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas sdong dum dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-5: lam de ni zhe 'gras pa'i sems med pas bde bar 'gro ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-10: reg dang bral bas g-yo can dang bral ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-11: lam de ni phung po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-13: skye mched la legs par btags pas phyir rgol ba dang bral ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-14: lam de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-15: lam de ni nyan thos dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang bral bas sems rlabs po cher 'gro ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-17: lam de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhugs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-18: lam de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che dang mthun pa'i rin po che chen po bsgrub pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-19: lam de ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas rtag tu gsal ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-20: lam de ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis legs par yongs su zin pas dge ba ston pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-21: lam de ni rjes su chags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-22: khong khro ba med pas mthon dman med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-23: lam de ni gnod sems dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-25: khro ba med pas rdul dang bral ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192a-26: lam de ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bas bde 'gror 'gro ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-0: lam @192b de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gro bas bde ba'i phyogs su 'gro ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-2: de ltar na gang la nyan thos dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-3: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-4: lam ma yin pa de 'dra ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-5: lam de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-6: byang chub kyi lam gyi le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so; ;gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ci 'dra /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyogs tsam zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-9: de skad ces smras pa dang; gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-10: byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-12: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:192b-23: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-0: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi dgongs @193a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-1: shing rab tu mi rtog par spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-3: de la lha dang mi kha cig 'dug pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-4: lha dang mi kha cig 'chag pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-5: lha dang mi kha cig 'greng ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'greng bar mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-6: lha dang mi kha cig nyal ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mnal bar mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-7: lha dang mi kha cig chos ston pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-8: lha dang mi kha cig mi smra ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi gsung bar gyur par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-9: lha dang mi kha cig bsam gtan gtso bor byed pa de dag gi ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-10: lha dang mi kha cig langs pa gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhengs par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193a-11: lha dang mi kha cig mig mi 'dzum par blta ba gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mi 'dzum par gzigs pa mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-0: lha dang mi kha cig 'dzum pa byed pa gtso bor 'dzin pa @193b de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzum pa mdzad par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-1: lha dang mi kha cig mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu gtso bor byed pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-2: de bzhin du la las ni dngul gyi mdog tu mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-3: de bzhin du shel gyi mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-7: mu tig dmar po'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-8: mu tig dkar po'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-22: mtshal gyi mdog tu mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-23: la las ni chu'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-24: la las ni mya ngan 'tshang gi me tog gi mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-26: sna ma'i me tog gi mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-32: rnam thos kyi bu'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-33: ngang ba'i rgyal bo ngang skya'i mdog dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-35: dpal gyi snying po'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-36: rin po che byi ru'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:193b-37: nor bu rin po che'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-2: nam mkha' dag pa gzi brjid kyi mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-3: lha dang mi kha cig yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas par mos bde dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i yon tan gyi sngags pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-5: de ltar yongs su brtag par nye bar bzung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can ji snyed yod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-7: gang yang gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad mi'i lus thob par gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-8: de'i nang nas sems can gcig gis sems can de dag ji snyed pa snyed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-12: spyod lam du sems shing mos te mngon par bsgrub la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-13: sems can gcig gis ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can de dag thams cad re res kyang de snyed la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-17: spyod lam du sems shing mos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194a-19: sems can gcig gis sems kyi mos pa gang yin pa de sems can gnyis pa'i ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems @194b kyi mos pa tshim par mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-1: ji ltar mos pa bzhin du sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mdog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-5: spyod lam du shes mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-6: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-7: thugs kyi mdzad pa ni ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i khyad par gyis lhun gyis grub pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-9: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par mdzad pa'i gzugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-13: spyod lam gyis kun du bzhugs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-17: me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa la gzugs su snang ba la ci 'dra ba nye bar bzhag pa de 'dra ba nyid kyi gzugs brnyan de na lhag chad med par mtshungs par snang yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-18: me long gi dkyil 'khor ni mi sems mi rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-20: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi dgongs mi rtog par lhun gyis grub pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa tshim par mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-22: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-24: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phung pos rab tu phye ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-25: khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-26: skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-27: las las byung ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:194b-28: nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-2: 'byung ba chen po'i nur nur bo las byung ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-3: sha dang khrag gis g-yogs pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-4: rus pa dang chu ba'i bog des sbrel ba ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-5: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang srog dang 'brel ba ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-11: spros pa med cing rgyu ba med pa'i sku yin yang de gzugs dang mtshan gtso bor byed pa'i sems can sku bstan pas 'dul ba rnams kyi mig la snang bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-12: gzugs las dben pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du bltar snang par mi 'gyur ro zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-13: de la 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa'i sems can gyi nang nas kyang kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-14: kha cig gis ni mi mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-15: kha cig ni rgyang ring po na 'dug kyang mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-16: kha cig ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-17: kha cig ni thag ring po na 'dug kyang mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195a-18: kha cig ni nye ba na 'dug kyang mi mthong ngo /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-2: gzhan gyis bstan pas mi mthong ngo //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-4: sad pa na mi mthong ngo //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-7: la las ni langs na mthong la mnyam par bzhag na mi mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-8: la las ni sdug pa'i rnam par mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-9: mi sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-10: la las ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par mi mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-11: sdug pa'i rnam par ma yin no; ;la las ni ma btsal bas mi mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-13: la las ni ma bcal bas mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-15: la las ni bsgrims na mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-16: ma bsgrims na ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-17: la las ni ma bsgrims na mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-20: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'di dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-21: gzhan yang tshad med pa'i rnam par ston par mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-22: gang yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu'i lus dang spyod pa dang spyod lam rab tu zhi ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-24: lus zhi ba dul ba de dag gi mig kyang 'khrul par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:195b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag par bya ba'am mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni kha dog @196a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-1: tha dad pas tshad med pa'o /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-2: chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-4: nam mkhas ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus khyab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-8: nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-10: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-14: nam mkha' ni spros pa med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-16: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang spros pa mi mnga' ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-20: nam mkha' ni sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-22: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-26: nam mkha' ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-28: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang 'gyur ba mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-32: nam mkha' ni gzugs su snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196a-34: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang sems can du snang ba thams cad du zhugs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-2: nam mkha'i nang du ni gzugs su snang ba thams cad 'dus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-4: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du yang sems can du snang ba thams cad 'dus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-11: nags tshal thams cad rnam par 'phel lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-13: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las kyang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par 'phel lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-17: nam mkha' ni rtag pa yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-18: mi rtag pa yang ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-19: cir yang brjod pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-21: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang rtag pa yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-22: mi rtag pa yang ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-23: cir yang brjod pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-27: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong par nus pa de ni kho pos lha dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-29: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-30: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-31: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:196b-34: kho bos 'di ltar mngon par shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-0: bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas @197a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-2: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na drang srong lhung ba ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs pa'i dus gcig na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-3: shar phyogs logs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dgra 'dul nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang zhes bya ba de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-4: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-6: mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-7: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-9: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang 'di snyam du sems te; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-10: sku tshad med cing mtha' yas kyang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dang mtha' yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis rang gi lus dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du byin gyis brlabs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bltas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad par mthong nas des 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-0: bdag ni mngon par shes pa thob pa rdzu 'phrul @197b gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba yin gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-1: bdag gis de bas kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad btsal bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-2: snyam nas de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis stobs bskyed pas steng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung byed ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams padma can zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho la bzhes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-4: chos kyang ston pa der byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang phyin nas de 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug mthong bar ma nus shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dam mtha' yang ma dmigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-8: bcom ldan 'das padma'i dpal gyi rgyal po'i snying po de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-9: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-10: bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-11: bcom ldan 'das bdag thag rje srid cig nas mchis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:197b-13: rigs kyi bu gangg'a'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-2: byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis gsol pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-4: bdag thag ring po zhig nas mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de'i dbu'i gtsug mthong bar yang rngo ma thog la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-5: sku'i tshad dam mtha' rtogs par yang rngo ma thog lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-6: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-7: rigs kyi bu khyod ga te shugs 'di nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-8: rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa 'di nyid kyis gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par steng gi phyogs logs su song du zin kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-9: bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-11: gang yang dpe bzhag pa ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dper bya ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-15: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-20: mtshan gyi dper bya ba'i dper 'god pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-21: dpe gcig ni ma gtogs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-23: nam mkha' ji tsam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyang de tsam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-24: ting nge 'dzin kyang de tsam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-25: shes rab kyang de tsam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198a-26: rnam par grol ba yang de tsam mo //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-6: de bas na nam mkha' tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad med pa khong du chud par bya'o zhes bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das de las bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-9: tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-10: dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-11: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-12: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-14: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-15: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-16: bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-18: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-19: nam mkha' mtshungs shing 'dra ba yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-20: sangs rgyas chos la mi gang zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-21: pha rol du ni mchi 'tshal ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-22: de ni nyam thag 'gyur ba lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-23: sangs rgyas sku ni blta slad du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-24: gangg'a bye ba phrag brgya yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:198b-25: bye ma ji snyed de snyed kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-2: de snyed zhing du mchis nas ni //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-5: sku yi tshad kyang ma mthong lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-6: zhing de na ni 'dre na bzhugs pa //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-8: de yis bdag gi bsam mkhyen nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-9: 'di skad du ni bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-10: la las sangs rgyas chos rnams la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-11: dpe dgod ji snyed byed pa ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-12: de dag sangs rgyas mi 'tshal te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-13: de dag rgyal la skur ba 'debs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-14: 'di la dpe gcig yang dag ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-15: nam mkha'i khams su bstan pa lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-16: de ni sangs rgyas chos dang mthun //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-17: gang na'ang de yi tshad ma mchis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-18: nam mkha' 'di ni ji tsam par //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-20: ting nge 'dzin dang rnam grol dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-21: rnam grol ye shes mthong de tsam //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199a-34: thugs kyis ji snyed khyab gyur pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-0: byams @199b pas kyang ni de snyed khyab //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-4: sku yis kyang ni de snyed khyab //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-7: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-8: de la gal te gzugs mchis na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-9: nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-10: de ni de bas lhag par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-11: sems can kun gyi bsod nams kyi //
