K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-13: de snyed byang chub sems dpa' yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-14: byang chub sems las rab tu byung //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-15: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-16: phung po ji snyed brjod pa bas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-17: dam pa'i chos ni yongs 'dzin na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-18: de bas bsod nams ches mang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-19: dam chos 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-20: sangs rgyas kun gyis nan tan du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-21: bskal pa bye bar brjod byas kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-22: mtha' mar phyin par 'gyur ma lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-23: dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-24: byang chub sems kyi bsod nams de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-25: stong pa nyid la mos pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-26: bcu drug char yang mi ri lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-27: stong pa nyid la 'dir mos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-28: byang chub sems kyang mi gtong dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-29: dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin bgyid pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-30: 'di ni bsod nams sdud pa lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-31: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po; ;chos kyi rtogs pa 'di thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-32: de yi byang chub spyad spyod cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-34: tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:199b-35: zhing rnams bye bar rab tu g-yos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-1: ni bye ba phrag stong gis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-2: rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba blangs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-3: sangs rgyas kyi ni phye ba nyid //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-5: srog chags bye ba phrag stong dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-6: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa po //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-8: rang byung rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-9: gnas 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-10: dpag yas bla na ma mchis lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-12: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-15: de na sems can du ma 'khor gcig tu 'dus pa dag las /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-16: kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-17: kha cig gis ni ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-18: de la gang dag gis mthong ba de dag ni dga' ba skyes nas blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-19: gang dag gis ma mthong ba de dag ni cang mi smra bar gyur cing sdod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhal zas mi gsol mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-22: sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas gsol bar mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-24: de la byang chub kyi rim gro pa'i lha gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya dag rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring du 'brang zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200a-25: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du bzed na sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i kham tshad du blangs te gsol bar mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-0: de bzhin gshegs pas @200b kham tshad du blangs pa de de yang snod de nyid na 'dug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-1: de lha de dag gis khyer nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dus pa'i sems can sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-2: las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis skye gnas de dang de dag tu 'phangs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-6: bkres pas nyams chung bar gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos kyi pham phabs de byin nas sems can de dag gis kyang zas de zos pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-8: bde zhing lus tshim nas bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-9: gang dag log par ltung ba yi dvags sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-10: gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus pa de dag la yang de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-12: rnam grangs 'dis na yang khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa zhal zas mi gsol zhing de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zhal zas can du de ltar rig par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sred med kyi bu ltar mkhregs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-16: mi shigs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:200b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni pho ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-0: @201a *// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gar bu lta bu ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-2: ba spu'i bu ga med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-3: kha na ma tho ba med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-5: 'di ltar ci khyad rdo rje dang 'dra yang 'jam khyad ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i che ba nyid la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-7: gang gi tshe gzi brjid che ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-8: gzi brjid che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-9: lha'i bu mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-10: sngon ma reg pa'i reg pa reg nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-11: de dag nyon mongs pa bskyed par mi 'gyur ba'i dus de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-14: sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral bar shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-15: zhe sdang la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag byams pa thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-16: gti mug la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag ye shes kyi snang ba thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-17: cha mnyam pa la spyod pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag nyon mongs pa dang bral bar shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-18: ser sna can gang dag gis mthong na de dag gtong ba la mos par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201a-19: tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag gis mthong na de dag tshul khrims la mos par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-0: @201b gnod sems can gang dag gis mthong na de dag bzod pa 'thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-1: le lo can gang dag gis mthong na de dag brtson 'grus la mos par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-2: sems g-yeng ba gang dag gis mthong na de dag ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-3: shes rab 'chal pa gang dag gis mthong na de dag shes rab la mos par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-5: mdor na sems can dkar po'i chos gang dang gang dag dang bral ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ma thag tu mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad rgyun chad nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-6: dge ba'i sems la rab tu gnas par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-7: de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-9: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-11: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang sprul pa de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrims pa mi mnga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-12: mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa 'di snyam du ngas sprul pa dag sprul to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-15: sprul par bya'o snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-16: 'on kyang sprul pas 'dul ba'i sems can ji snyed par 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:201b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgya stong de dang de dag tu sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de snyed du bzhud de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i don du sku las 'od kha dog du ma pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-5: kha dog brgya stong pa dag byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-6: 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba byed pa de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrims pa mi mnga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-7: mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-9: 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dang sku'i phrin las te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-10: sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan du zad kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-11: bskal pa'am de bas lhag par brjod kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa'i mthar phyin par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-14: srog chags khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-15: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-16: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nges kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-17: gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la lha dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-18: mi'i me tog rnams kyis mngon par gtor to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-0: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo @202b rje'i spyi bo la bzhag nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang snang zhing rjes su dgyes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-3: zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i le'us te bdun pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-5: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-7: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-8: gsung gi phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-10: gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-11: gang gi nub mo len pa mi mnga' bar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas tha na yi ge'i 'bru gcig kyang ma gsungs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la dbugs phyung ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-21: rnam par dpyod pa med na ngag mi 'byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang rnam par mi rtog /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:202b-25: rnam par rtog par mi mdzad /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-2: gsung bar mi mdzad kyang sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung ngo snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-5: yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rig pa mi mdzad kyang sems can yi ge lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-7: bdag cag la chos ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-8: bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-9: de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms su mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshems dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-15: zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba yang med la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi sgra 'byung ba de ni nam mkha' las 'byung na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-18: sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-19: sgra 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ngo snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par 'byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-22: rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203a-34: snyan pa dang dul ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-4: lus sim par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-5: sems tshim par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-6: snying dga' bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-8: yongs su gdung ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-9: kun tu shes par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-10: rnam par rig par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-13: mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-14: kun shes par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-15: rnam par rig par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-17: zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-18: seng ge'i sgra'i shugs can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-19: glang po che'i sgra skad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-23: bya ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-24: tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-25: shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-26: lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-30: sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-31: tshig zur chag pa med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-32: ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-40: sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-41: dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:203b-46: 'dod chags zhi bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-1: mchog dang ldan par 'byung ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni yan lag drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan par 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-5: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-6: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du nga mdo'i sde'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-14: de lta bu byung ba'i sde'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-17: rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-18: gtan la phabs par bstan pa'i sde'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-22: kun tu bsnyad pa 'di ston to zhe'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-23: rab tu gsal bar mdzad do zhe'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-24: rab tu shes par mdzad do zhe'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-29: yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgongs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204a-30: de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa ci 'dra ba dge slong gi 'khor ram /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-3: lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang rung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-4: der de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-5: de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas dgongs par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-6: chos bstan pa de ni phan tshun gyi nges pa'i tshig tha dad pa la gnod pa med par thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun tu shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-8: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-10: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa dag gi spyod pa tshad med pa gsungs na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-11: sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes 'byung ba ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-12: sems can dbang po mthu chung ba rnams gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pas bstan gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-14: sems can gyi spyod pa ni tshad med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-15: sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de bskal pa tsam du bshad kyang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-16: zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-17: gti mug la spyod pa rnams kyi gang yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:204b-18: sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams kyi spyod pa gang yin pa de dag bskal pa tsam du bstan kyang de dag re re yang de bas lhag par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-0: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshe tshad bskal pa brgya stong du @205a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-1: bzhugs pas sems can rnams la chos bstan pa gzhan gyi skabs mi dbye bar sems can gyi spyod pa nyid bstan kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe mthar thug par 'gyur gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-3: sems can gyi spyod pa la mthar thug pa gang yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-4: sems can rnams mgo rmongs su 'ong zhes sems can gyi spyod pa de tsam du tshad med pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas tshad dang ldan par ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-6: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-7: ji ltar spyod pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba bzhin du sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la 'byung ste; zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-8: 'di 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-10: sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung ba mi shes kyi nam mkha' las 'byung bar shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-12: sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-13: snyam du khyod sems na de ltar mi blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-16: sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gtsug tor nas byung bar shes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-17: spyi gtsug nas byung bar shes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-18: dbu skra rnams las byung bar shes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205a-19: phrag pa nas byung bar shes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-7: mgul nas byung bar shes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-8: de bzhin du dbung [*dpung] ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-10: sor mo dang; rtsib logs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-21: dpe byad bzang po rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-22: spu'i khung bu thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes pa'i sems can kha cig yod do /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-24: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-26: mos pa ji lta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-27: yongs su smin pa ji lta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-28: bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar shes kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-30: de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-35: rol mo sil snyan gyi 'khrul 'khor de tsam du legs par sbyar ba byas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-36: gang dag la lag gis ma reg par rlung gis bskyod pas sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dag kyang yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-37: 'on kyang de la sgra 'byin par spro ba gang yang med mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:205b-38: yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i khyad par gyis sgra snyan pa yang 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa'i @206a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-2: 'on kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byin par spro ba yang mi mnga' mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-3: sngon yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa'i khyad par gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su 'jug par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-7: brag ca'i sgra ni gzhan rnam par rig par byed pa yang 'byung la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-8: de'i nang na yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-9: phyi rol na yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-10: gnyis ka med pa las kyang mi dmigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par rig par byed par 'byung la de'i nang na yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-13: phyi rol na yang ma yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-14: gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-18: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong ba zhes bya ba yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-19: de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-20: sems can gang gis bsam pa ci 'dra bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgra de las 'byung yang nor bu rin po che de ni rnam par mi rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206a-22: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rin po che lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa yang snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-0: sems can gang gis bsam pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i @206b gsung 'byung bar des shes kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing btang snyoms pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-2: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsung dbyangs tshad med pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-6: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi tshad dam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-7: mtha' gzung bar nus pa de ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-8: kho bos lha dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-10: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-11: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-14: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-17: kho bos mngon par shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-18: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing bzhugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa la brten nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-20: dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher rab tu ston pa de 'jug tu phyin pa'i dus kyi tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-21: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:206b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor ji srid cig tu ring du 'gro ba zhig bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor dpag par bya'o snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-0: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rang gi @207a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-1: stan gyi steng nas mi snang bar gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-2: ri rab kyi rtse mor phyin nas de de na 'dug na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung de 'dra bar kho nar thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-3: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi nub phyogs kyi ri rab las 'das shing gling bzhi pa las kyang 'das /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi khor yug gi zom la 'dug na yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung lhag chad med cing mnyam par de 'dra bar kho nar thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-8: kye ma mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di nga'i sgra skad dpog par 'dod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-9: ngas 'di dag la rdzu 'phrul gyis bstang ngo snyam nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyi bstongs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-11: de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-12: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-14: chos kyang ston pa der gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos phyin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207a-15: de na 'dug kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra skad de 'dra ba kho nar thos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-0: 'dom gang tsam @207b gyi phyogs na 'dug pa'i mis mi cig shos kyi sgra thos pa de bzhin du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-1: gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung sgra thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku'i khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-3: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus kyi khrun ni dpag tshad phyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi spyad par bya ba'i lhung bzed kyi rten ma gdu bu de la gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'chag cing 'dug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag rab tu dga' nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-6: bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-8: dge sbyong gi kha dog 'dra ba'i srog chags lhung bzed kyi rten ma'i gdu bu la 'chag cing mchis pa 'di ga las mchis pa zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-9: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-11: khyed 'di la brnyas pa'i sems ma bskyed cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-13: 'di ni gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po zhes bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-14: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:207b-15: nyan thos chen po rnams kyi nang na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog go; de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-0: mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa' @208a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-4: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-5: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-6: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-8: rin po che'i gling 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-10: mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-11: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bus steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun tsam gyi gong du mngon par 'phags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-12: rin po che'i gling de skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-13: skyil mo krung de las kyang mu tig gi rgyan phreng bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par 'phyang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-14: mu tig gi rgyan phreng gi 'bru thams cad las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-15: 'od zer de dag thams cad kyi rtse mo dag las kyang padma rnams byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208a-16: padma thams cad kyi snying po rnams la yang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs bzhugs par snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor @208b yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te bsngags pa gsung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-1: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dga' gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-3: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-6: stong gnyis pa khyab par bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyil mo krung gcig gis khyab par bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-10: mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis de'i dus na bab par shes na gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-11: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de bsdus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-14: bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-16: gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'di ci zhig gi slad du 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:208b-19: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor shes par 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das des gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-0: mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad @209a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-1: med pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor shes bar 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin gyi khyod kyis lan gnyis su de lta bu'i sems ma bskyed cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-2: gal te mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod shugs 'di nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-3: rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs 'di nyid kyis nub phyogs logs su gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par song yang khyod kyis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar gsung dbyangs tshad med pa dang ldan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-5: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor rtog par 'tshal bas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-7: bdag ni nongs pa can de nongs pa 'chags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-9: bdag ji srid cig nas mchis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-10: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas khyod 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-12: mo'u dgal gyi bus gsol pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-14: bdag ni ring mo zhig nas mchis pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi ba'i rdo mi thog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209a-17: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-0: mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam @209b du sems /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-1: khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin snyam du sems na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-3: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-5: khyod bcom ldan 'das de nyid la phyag 'tshol cig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-6: de nyid kyis khyod slar khrid par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-8: gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni bskal pa srid kyis kyang phyin par mi nus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams der ma phyin par bar du yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur ro; ;mo'u dgal gyi bu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-19: gang nas 'dir mchis pa ma 'tshal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-20: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-21: mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-22: gal te khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams der 'gro na ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-23: bskal pas kyang phyin par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-26: phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de bzhugs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:209b-29: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni shar phyogs logs na bzhugs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-0: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de'i tshe yan lag lnga sa la @210a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-2: shar phyogs logs su phyag 'tshal nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-3: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-4: mthu chen mnga' ba lha dang mis mchod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-5: ye shes mtha' yas mtha' yas gsung ldan pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-6: rkang gnyis rnams kyi dam pa dgongs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-7: slar yang zhing 'dir rab tu mchi bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-9: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa des gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyis bus gsol ba btab ba'i sgra de thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-11: thos nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-13: 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa 'di su zhig lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-16: 'di ni mo'u dgal gyi bu ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung dgu cu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed 'das par song ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-19: de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'dod pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-20: gsol ba 'debs pa'i sgra de lta bu phyung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210a-23: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams der mchis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-0: mo'u dgal @210b gyi bu 'dir slar 'ongs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-2: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des thal mo sbyar te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-3: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-8: gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po blta bar 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor des gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-10: mdzod spu nas thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-11: 'od zer des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed po de dag las thal te 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-12: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-14: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-15: gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-16: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-19: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i rjes su 'brangs te shog cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:210b-20: de nas gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te @211a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-1: sems kyis rnam par rtog pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-2: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-3: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-4: phyag 'tshal nas nyes pa bshags pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-6: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs tshad ma mchis pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rtogs par 'tshal na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-7: de srid du ring du mchis pas bdag nongs pa can te nongs pa 'chags so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-8: de srid du ring du mchis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni 'di na ji tsam pa de tsam lags so //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-10: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-14: mtha'i yongs su tshol bar sems pa de ni nam mkha'i tshad dam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-15: mtha' yongs su tshol bar sems pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-17: nam mkha' ji tsam du khyab pa de tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis khyab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211a-18: gnas brtan mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'gro ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-0: srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag @211b par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-2: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-5: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci mang ba yin nam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-6: zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-8: sems can gcig gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen por gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba rnams kyis bskal par yang bsam pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-12: sems can thams cad kyi lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-13: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-16: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-17: sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'jug pa ji snyed pa 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:211b-18: sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung gi yan lag gi rnam pa yang de snyed du 'byung ste /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:212a-2: nga yis yid 'di shes so zhes //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:212a-3: de ni rtog par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:212a-4: dus gsum sems can thams cad kyi //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:212a-34: de ltar nyon mongs rnams med cing //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:212a-36: ji ltar phyogs bcur sangs rgyas gsung //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215a-25: grol ba'i bye brag phyed par mtshams sbyor ba zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215a-29: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215a-33: byed pa mthar thug ces bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-3: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi 'di skad ces bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-7: nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-9: de ltar ji ltar lha rnams kyi bden pa rnam par bzhag pa de bzhin du klu rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-10: gnod sbyin rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-11: dri za rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-12: lha ma yin rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-13: nam mkha' lding rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-14: mi'am ci rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-15: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-16: gnod sbyin lag na gzhong thogs rnams kyi yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-17: phreng thogs rnams kyi bden pa rnam par bzhag pa yang gzhan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-19: gang yang yul chen po bcu drug tu bsdu bas bsdus pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di yongs su gang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-20: gang na mi rnams kyi tshig kyang gzhan /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:215b-22: brda yang tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming tha dad pa rnams kyi bden pa dag rnam par bgod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216a-40: 'jig rten gyi bar na gnas pa'i yul la sogs pa'i yul stong gis 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216a-42: gang na mi rnams kyi tshig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216a-44: brda tha dad pa der yang de bzhin gshegs pas skad kyi 'jug pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming du tha dad pa rnams kyis bden pa dag bstan kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216a-45: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216a-46: rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin par 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-0: stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bden pa ming tha dad pas bstan @216b pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-1: bden pa bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-2: don dam pa'i bden pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-3: skye ba med pa'i bden pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-4: ji lta ba bzhin gyi bden pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-5: mi 'khrugs pa'i bden par don gcig tu yang dag par 'dus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-7: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-10: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-11: sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-13: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-14: sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-16: yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung nas sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-18: sems can thams cad 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-19: gnas brtan sh'a radva ti'i bu'i shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan par gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:216b-20: sh'a ri'i bu lta bu sems can de dag thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes gang yin pa'i shes rab dang ye shes de sems can gcig dang ldan par gyur cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-0: rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad shes rab dang ye shes de lta bu @217a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-3: sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-4: bskal pa las lhag par the tshom gyi dri ba bsams shing gzhal te; yongs su bsal na sems can gcig gi the tshom gyi dri ba gang yin pa de gnyis pa'i ma yin zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-6: rnam grangs 'dis sems can thams cad kyi the tshom kyi dri pa tha dad pa bsams te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du dong nas se gol gtogs pa srid la the tshom gyi dri ba de dag gsol kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-8: de sems can gcig gi rjes su zhugs pa'i dran pas thams cad bzung nas gsung brjod pa gcig gis de dag gi the tshom gyi dri ba thams cad gcod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-9: de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi the tshom gyi dri ba chad par shes shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas thams cad kyang sems rangs par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-12: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni sems can thams cad kyi dogs pa gcod cing sems can thams cad kyi som nyi sel kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de la thugs kyis mdzad pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-14: gsung du brjod pa yang mi mnga' la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-15: mdzad pa de yang mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-17: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-18: 'di ni gsung rmad du byung ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217a-19: 'di ni gsung yongs su dag pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-0: de bzhin @217b gshegs pa'i gsung ngo mtshar can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-1: gsung gi gsang ba 'di gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bshad pa'i srog chags sum khri nyis stong gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-2: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir me tog rnams kyis kyang gtor /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-3: rin po che'i gdugs rnams kyang btang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-4: de nas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la yang phog /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-5: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i lus la yang phog cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-7: rin po che'i gdugs de dag kyang bar snang la gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na 'dug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-9: rin po che'i gdugs de dag las kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-11: bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyi ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-12: des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rmad du byung ba 'di bstan pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rjes su gzung ba'i slad du bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis btang ba lags so zhes sgra byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:217b-13: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-0: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la @218a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-1: phyag 'tshal zhing gus pa cher bskyed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-2: tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mthong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-4: gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos shing som nyi za bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni don yod pa'i mi nyid rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-5: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-6: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-11: gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang du bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-14: gang dag chos bstan pa 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ring po mi thogs par chos nyid 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218a-15: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-2: don rtogs pa'i rjes su rtogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-3: de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-4: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-5: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-6: dpag tu med pa dag rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-7: snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-8: me tog gi char chen po yang bab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-10: rol mo'i sgra byang byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-11: sems can grangs med pa dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-12: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-13: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-14: byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa dag gis ni skye ba gcig gis thogs par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-15: de nas 'khor de'i khyams kyi dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chu'i rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyis sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad pa brtol te mngon du byung bar snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-16: de dag steng gi bar snang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:218b-17: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad spos chus chag chag btab par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-0: @219a *// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-2: khyod kyis chu'i rgyun mngon par 'phags pa 'di dag mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-9: chu'i rgyun 'di dag sems med kyang ji ltar 'di dag gis sa chen po brtol te mngon par 'phags pa de bzhin du gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-10: de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-11: de dag ni ma rig pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-12: lta bar 'gyur ba'i sgo glegs bcag nas chos kyi snang ba mi zad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-13: shes rab dang spobs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;de skyes bu de dag gis legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnams tshim par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-14: 'di ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-16: gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219a-18: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219b-0: @219b thugs kyi 'phrin las yongs su dag pa gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219b-4: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris su sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa gcig gis bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshe'i mthar ma thug gi bar du de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi rjes su ma 'brang ste; de nas shi 'phos nas las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219b-6: de bzhin gshegs bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa yang mi gnas pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219b-7: gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:219b-8: gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la ldog pa mi mnga'o //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220a-28: thugs chos la gnas pa mi mnga'/

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220a-31: thugs na ngan nas pa mi mnga'/

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220a-33: thugs de chos rnams la mi 'jug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220a-34: thugs de ye shes la mi 'jug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220a-37: da ltar byung ba la mi rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar thugs yongs @220b su dag pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-1: thugs kyis chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-2: chos thams cad la yang de'i ye shes ma chags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-4: rang gi thugs yongs su dag pas sems can gang gi sems kyang yongs su ma dag par mi gzigs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-5: de gzigs kyang gzigs pa ma yin zhing rnam par mi rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-6: gzigs kyang spros par mi mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-8: rnam par gzigs pa mi gzigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de ni sha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-10: lha'i mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-11: shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-12: chos kyi mig gis mthong ba dang ldan pa ma yin /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-14: lha'i rna bas thos pa dang ldan pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-15: gzhan gyi sems la lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-16: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-17: rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-18: zag pa zad pa shes pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-19: de chos thams cad dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-20: chos thams cad la chags pa med par ldan pa yang ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-21: de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi rgyun rnams ni bsgrim pa mi mnga' zhing lhun gyis grub la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-22: mngon par 'du mdzad par mi mnga' bar gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-23: sems can gyi spyod pa thams cad la gzigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:220b-24: sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-0: @221a *// rnam par byang ba yang rab tu mkhyen to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mkhyen pa yang bsnyel ba mi mnga' ste; de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-4: mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bar 'jug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang yang bral la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-6: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas kyang mi 'dor ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-7: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-8: de'i chos thams cad la chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes kyang gang du yang mi chags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-12: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pa gang yin pa de la ni sems kyang mi mnga'; yid kyang mi mnga'/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-13: rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-15: gsung gi 'du byed kyang mi mnga'/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-16: thugs kyi 'du byed kyang mi mnga' mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-18: sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-20: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sprul pa dang mtshungs pas mnyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-21: sprul pa'i chos nyid kyis rnam par mi rtog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-22: de la sku'i rtsom pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221a-24: thugs kyi rtsom pa yang mi snang la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad kyang mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-0: de yang lhun gyis grub @221b cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-1: mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-4: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-5: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can la thugs brtse bas de bzhin du bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni 'dus byas la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-8: 'dus ma byas la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-9: phung po la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-10: khams la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-11: skye mched la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-12: nang la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-13: phyi la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-14: dge ba la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-15: mi dge ba la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-16: 'jig rten la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-17: 'jig rten las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-18: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-19: kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-20: zag pa dang bcas pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-21: zag pa med pa la gnas pas ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-22: 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-23: ma 'ongs pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-24: da ltar byung ba la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-25: so sor brtag pa la gnas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-26: so sor brtags pa ma yin pa la gnas pa ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-28: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas pa mi mnga'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:221b-29: de chos gang yang mngon par mi sgrub la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-0: sems can la thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad kyi @222a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-3: bsam pa rnams la yang de'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa mi mnga' zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-4: thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'jug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-5: de yang lhun gyis grub cing bsgrim pa mi mnga' la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-6: mngon par 'du bya ba mi mnga' bas 'jug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-8: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-9: mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la sems can thams cad la sems rnam par rig par yang mdzad pas thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-13: phyogs bcu dag na bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thad na da ltar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi slad na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po mchis lags sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-16: bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab kyi zhog cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222a-17: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-0: gang dag dad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de @222b dag gnas 'di la skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-3: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la yid ches par mchi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-5: sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-8: da ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus mthong lags te; 'di sngon ni bdag gis nam yang ma mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-11: de bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po la ga na rdo rje 'di ni bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyab rgyab na yang gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-12: sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-13: mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis thams cad du yang lag na rdo rjes gzugs su kun tu ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-16: sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi rgyab rgyab tu gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-17: lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kun tu bstan kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-18: des ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs yongs su rdzogs par bstan par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-19: sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje 'dug pa mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:222b-21: bdag gis da gdod mthong lags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-0: 'di ni de'i rgyab na rtag tu ku gnas na khyod kyis de ma mthong ba ma gtogs par byang chub @223a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-4: 'jig rten skyong ba gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyab na lag na rdo rje /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-5: rdo rje thogs shing rtag tu 'dug par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-7: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-8: bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul kyang de dag thams cad kyi rgyab na yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas par snang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-9: byin gyis brlabs pa de dag thams cad ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa gang yin pa de dag gi rgyab na yang 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-13: gsang pa ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ni de ltar ye shes dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-14: mngon par shes pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang ldan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-15: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-19: byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223a-21: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-0: @223b bkod pa bstan pa las brtsams te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-1: de na rmad du byung ba'i rgyu gang dag byung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-2: gang du khyod la mngon sum du gyur pa khyod spobs par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-3: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bkod pa byung ba ni tshad med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-6: de dag ni tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas pas kyang rgyas par rnam par phye ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-7: bstan par sla ba ma yin mod kyi; 'on kyang cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i dka' ba spyod pa na rnam pa gcig ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-10: mu stegs can gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas spyad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-12: lus la yongs su gdung ba ji snyed dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-13: lus kyi spyod lam ji snyed kyis pha rol mu stegs can dag mngon par snyems pa de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa 'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-14: ches mchog tu gyur pa'i bya dka' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-16: dka' thub gang dag gis bya bas kun du bstan par mi nus pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas kun du bstan te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-18: de la kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rkang pa ya gcig btsugs te 'dug par mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-19: kha cig gis ni lag pa bteg ste 'dug par mthong /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-21: kha cig gis ni gdung ba lngas gdung bar mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:223b-22: kha cig gis ni tso tsog pur 'dug cing spong ba la sbyor bar brtson par mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-1: gis ni rkang pa btsugs te mi 'gul bar mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-2: kha cig gis ni rkang pa gyen du bsgrengs te 'dug par mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-3: kha cig gis ni kha phub tu 'dug par mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-4: kha cig gis ni tsher ma'i steng na nyal bar mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-5: kha cig gis ni ba lang gi lci ba'i nang na nyal bar mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-6: kha cig gis ni rdo leb la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-7: kha cig gis ni rtsig pa la snyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-8: kha cig gis ni shing leb la snyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-9: kha cig gis ni gtun shing la snyes pa dang /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-13: kha cig gis ni rtsva mun dza'o gos gyon pa dang /
