K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-15: kha cig gis ni rtsva ku sha'i gos gyon pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-16: kha cig gis ni ri dvags kyi pags pa'i gos gyon pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-17: kha cig gis ni rtsva rtsir gyon pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-18: kha cig gis ni sgren mor 'dug pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-19: kha cig gis ni rtsva dar bha'i gos gyon pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-20: kha cig gis ni shing shun gyi gos gyon pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-21: kha cig gis ni sred za ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-22: kha cig gis ni nas za bar mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-23: kha cig gis ni rtsa ba za ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-24: lo ma za ba ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224a-29: padma'i rtsa ba za ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-0: nas @224b shin te ma za ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-2: mon sran sde'u za ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-3: mon sran dre'u za ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-7: chu 'thung ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-8: mar gyi thigs ba tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-9: sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-10: 'o ma'i thigs pa tsam gyis 'tsho ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-11: kha cig gis ni zas mi za ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-12: kha cig gis ni gnyid dang bral bar mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-13: kha cig gis ni 'dug pa 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-14: kha cig gis ni 'greng ba 'ba' zhig tu mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-16: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-17: dka' ba spyod pa tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang ston ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-18: lo drug tshang bar spyod lam gcig kyang ma 'khrugs par thams cad rdzogs par bstan par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-19: brtul zhugs shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-20: brtson 'grus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-21: dka' thub shin tu brtan pos lo drug tu brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad ston kyang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-22: sems can gzhan dang gzhan la ma mos pa dag gis brtul zhugs dang dka' thub gzhan dang gzhan du mi mthong ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-23: gzhan du na ci 'dre ba'i brtugs zhugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:224b-24: dka' thub ci 'dra ba dag gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub mthong ba ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-0: de la byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med @225a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-1: pa'i btang snyoms can yang yin la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-2: bya ba de dag la kun tu ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-3: dka' ba spyad pa 'dis lha dang mi bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi theg pa gsum po dag la yongs su smin par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-5: lha dang mi gang dag rgya chen po la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug cing mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-8: lo drug lon nas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin de las langs par mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-10: de la lha dang mi chos can chos 'dod pa chos bstan pas yongs su smin par bya ba gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan mi byed par rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par mthong ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-12: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor ba ye shes chen po yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-13: chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa zhes bya'o /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-14: bya dka' ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-16: de ltar lo drug tshang nas byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smos pa'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub de dag las langs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225a-17: klung ne ranydza na'i 'gram du song nas 'jig rten dang mthun par khrus byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-1: klung ne ranydza na nas byung ste 'dug par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-2: de na grong mi'i bu mo legs skyes ma zhes bya ba des ba stong gi 'o ma bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i 'o thug khyer te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-3: byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-11: lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag drug cu yang rang rang gi zas thogs te 'khod nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-12: so so nas tshig 'di skad du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-16: bdag gi bshos gsol cig zer ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-18: des na byang chub sems dpas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la sogs pa lha dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-21: dri za bye ba khrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi kha zas de dag blangs nas thams cad zos kyang phan tshun mi mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-22: lha'i bu re res kyang byang chub sems dpas bdag gis bshos gsol te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-23: byang chub sems dpas bdag gi bshos gsol nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par 'gyur bar shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-24: de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:225b-26: 'di ni byang chub sems dpas zas len par sbyor ba dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-0: zas len pas sems can yongs su @226a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-1: smin par byed pa dka' ba spyod pa yang dag 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bkrus te lus stobs dang ldan par gyur nas zas zos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-3: byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-5: sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu sa bzang zhes bya bas sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad la bos te smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-6: sa 'dzin gang zhig mi g-yo mi spyod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-7: sred pa bsal cing khong khro rab spangs pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-8: byang chub sems dpa' de ni shing drung byon //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-9: sa gzhi dag ni legs par brgyan par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-10: legs so zhes te sa la spyod rnams dga'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-11: stong gsum thams cad yongs su phyag dar byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-12: me tog sil ma bkram zhing spos mchog bdugs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-13: spos chu dag gis sa gzhi chag chag btab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-14: lag na gzhong thogs de bzhin phreng ba thogs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-15: gzhal med khang gnas de bzhin par snang la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-16: de dag byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas dga'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-17: de tshe me tog sna tshogs rab tu phab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-18: gling bzhi pa dag rnams na skyong ba'i gzhi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-19: ji snyed pa dag thams cad 'khor bcas te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-20: rnam par 'dren la mchod par bya ba'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-21: gser gyi dra bas stong gsum thams cad bkab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-22: stong gsum 'jig rten brgya byin rdzu 'phrul che //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-23: de dag byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226a-24: sum cu rtsa gsum rnam rgyal khang mdzes pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-0: de ltas stong @226b gsum thams cad mdzes par brgyan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-1: 'thab bral lha rnams thams cad rab dga' ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-2: skyes bu mchog la yang dag mchod pa'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-3: mi mjed 'jig rten khams kyi stong gsum kun //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-4: nam mkha' bee d'ur+ya yi dra bas bkab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-5: dga' ldan rab dang dga' ldan lha rnams kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-6: de dag mu tig dra bas brgyan pa byas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-7: rgyan phreng de bzhin zla gam rnams kyang thogs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-8: mu ti gsil ma'i char yang rab tu 'bebs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-9: lha yi rgyal po rab tu 'phrul gyi bar //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-10: rab tu dga' nas 'dzam bu'i chu gser gyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-11: dril bu'i dra bas gser gyi dar bcas nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-12: sgra snyan bcas pas stong gsum thams cad bkab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-13: thams cad don la mi 'jigs mchod pa'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-14: dbang bsgyur dag gis lha yi rin po che //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-15: rnam par dag cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-16: 'od gsal dri med dra ba gcig kyang sprul //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-17: klu dang dri za lto 'phye chen po dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-18: lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci kun gyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-19: rang rang gnas nas bkod pa rnams kyis ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-20: 'dod khams legs par brgyan nas mdzes par byas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-22: de nas stong gsum gyi dbang po tshangs pa chen po dbang bsgyur zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong nas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bsnams pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:226b-26: dam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-1: pa; thugs yongs su mi skyo ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-2: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las nges par byung ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-6: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su bzhugs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-8: bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-11: sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-12: ded dpon chen por gyur pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-13: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-14: stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig pur gyur pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-15: chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-16: sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs brnyes pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-17: chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-19: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa padma chen po lta bu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-20: chos thams cad kyis gzungs ma bsnyel bar rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-22: khong khro ba dang bral ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-24: mi bskyong [*bskyod] pa ri rab chen po lta bu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227a-25: shin tu dri ma med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-0: @227b shin tu yongs su dag pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-1: shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-2: chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-3: sems las su rung ba tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu 'dul ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-8: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-9: sengge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-10: chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-11: sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-12: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-13: sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bstan par bzhed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-14: chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-15: byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-17: khyed byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-18: rim gro bya ba spro bar gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-19: de nas stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po de yid rab tu dga' nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-20: tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:227b-22: bskal pa brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang dka' thub bsags pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-0: skyes bu chen po dam pa @228a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-1: de byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der bzhud kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-2: de la khyod kyis bkod pa chen po rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad brgyan par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-3: de nas tshangs ba chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-4: sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-5: lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la phan bzhed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-6: lha dang mi yi mchod pa lha yi lha //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-7: thub pa chen po byang chub snying por gshegs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-8: bde dang bcas pa'i bdud ni gdul ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-9: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'tshang rgya dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos rnams yongs bkang dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-11: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-12: mkhas pa sengge'i sgra chen bsgrags pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-13: sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-14: dam pa'i chos mig yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-15: 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-16: phas kyi rgol ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-17: sngon gyi dam bcas yongs su bskang ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-18: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-19: 'dren pa byang chub snying por nye bar gshegs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-20: legs par thams cad lhan cig 'dug nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-21: sa yi gzhi ni legs par brgyan par bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-22: stong gsum brgyan par gyur la ltos shig kye //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-23: 'dod pa'i khams kyang brgyan par gyur la ltos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228a-24: 'dod pa'i khams ni ji ltar brgyan pa bzhin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-0: de ltar gzugs @228b kyi khams kyang brgyan par bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-1: tshangs pa rnams ni sems dang legs so zhes //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-2: rab tu dga' nas stong gsum brgyan par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-3: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams na bkod snang ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-4: de bas lhag pa'i mchod pa de dag bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-5: me tog rnams kyis bkang zhing spos kyis bkang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-6: rin chen rnams kyis mchod cing sil snyan bsgrags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-7: tshangs pa la sogs 'og min lha yi rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-8: rab tu dga' nas stong gsum thams cad kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-9: dga' bar 'gyur dang phyag bya'i 'os su byas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-10: rang rang gnas kyi gzhi yang bkod pa byas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-11: lha rnams kyis ni gong nas gong du yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-12: lhag pa lhag pa'i rgyan rnams rab tu bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-13: lha yi bu mo bye ba drug cu brgyas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-14: byang chub rdo rje gdan ni rgyan par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-15: spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'debs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-16: me tog sna tshogs dang kyang 'thor par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-17: sa gzhi dag las rin chen rnams kyang bkram //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-18: byang chub snying por brgyan rnams rab tu bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-19: thams cad tshig gis brjod par mi nus pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-20: de snyed tshad kyi bkod pa 'dir byas gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-22: byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na stong gi dbang po tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos tshangs ris kyi lha thams cad la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:228b-24: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por brtul zhugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-0: dka' thub rnams kyi spyod pa spyad pa sems can gyi mchog skyes bu chen po 'di la byang chub kyi snying por @229a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-2: de la khyed kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa chen po rnams kyis brgyan pa gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-3: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-4: sems can rnam dag brtul zhugs chos nges pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-5: phan bzhed 'jig rten don mdzad bdag nyid che //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-6: de ni blo ngan sder bcas bdud 'dul du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-7: shing gi dbang po byang chub drung du bzhud //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-8: thams cad 'dus te lhan cig 'dong par bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-9: stong gsum mi mjed 'di dag brgyan par bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-10: 'di ni lhar bcas 'jig rten chos kyi dbang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-11: yang dag mchod na bsod nams mtha' yas gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-12: tshangs pa de dag tshig mchog de thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-13: stong gsum thams cad ma lus rgyan byed cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-14: legs par phyags te me tog rgyal mtshan brgyan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-15: 'jig rten khams ni rin chen rang bzhin sprul //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-16: nyi ma zla ba'i 'od kyi bkod pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-17: bye ba'i gdugs rnams nam mkhar de dag sbrul //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-18: s'a la'i shing rnams me tog mchog spras pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-19: dga' tshal lta bu de dag rnams kyis sprul //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-20: lam gang nas ni drang srong che gshegs pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-21: de ni shing rta bdun bstan tshad du sprul //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-22: rin chen gzhi la gser gyi padma bkram //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-23: kha khyer rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229a-24: brgya byin gyis der bkod pa gang byas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-0: de dag lha mi rnams @229b kyi sngon ma mthong //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-1: sum cu gsum dbang rnam rgyal khang 'dra bar //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-2: de ltar gling bzhi dag ni mdzes par brgyan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-3: 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-4: gzhan 'phrul ba dang 'og min lha yi rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-5: stobs dang shugs 'chang thams cad brtson par ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-6: byang chub snying po dam pa rgyan par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-7: byang chub snying por gshegs pa'i bar der ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-8: 'dod pa'i khams 'dir dkon mchog gang yod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-9: lha'am klu 'am mi 'am ci rnams kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-10: de dag thams cad skad cig de la bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-11: phyogs bzhi dag na lha mi bye ba lhags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-12: me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa yis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-13: byang chub shing ni mngon du rgyan par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-14: spos chu yis ni kun du chag chag 'debs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-15: byang chub shing ni legs par brgyan byas te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-16: sum cu rtsa gsum lha yi yongs 'du 'dra //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-17: lha rnams bye ba dag gis mdzes sprul pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-18: bkod pa de dag tshig gis brjod mi nus //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na rkang pa'i mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa gnyis las 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-21: 'ong des sems can dmyal ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-23: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams rgyun bcad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:229b-24: klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-0: de nas klu'i bdag po nag pos byang chub sems dpa'i @230a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-2: tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-3: rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-4: thams cad dang ldan pa'i rang gi 'khor la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-6: gnas 'dir lhang der gyur pas na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-7: kho bo'i lus 'di rab tu tshim //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-8: sems kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-9: kho bos sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-10: ltas bzang mthong ba ltar na ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-11: gdon mi za bar dpa' chen po //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-13: legs par phye ma phreng ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-14: me tog spos dang byug pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-15: gser dang nor bu mu tig dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-16: dud dang rgyan phreng mchog rnams dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-17: rol mo sil snyan rnams thogs la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-18: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-19: ba dan dag kyang bsgrengs byas te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-20: ston pa la ni mchod par bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-21: klu yi rgyal po'i gnas 'di la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-22: bzang po'i rgyan rnams ji snyed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-23: de dag rab tu dga' ba yis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-24: sangs rgyas la ni rim gro bya //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-25: de nas klu'i rgyal po nag po chung ma'i 'khor dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-26: gnyen gyi 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-38: rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230a-39: lhan cig tu rang gi gnas nas byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-0: spos chus gang ba'i sprin mngon par @230b sprul nas spos chu'i char pa ni 'bebs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-2: me tog gi char ni 'bebs shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-4: klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-5: 'khor dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-8: sil snyan len pa dang bcas pas byang chub sems dpa' la bskor ba byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-9: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mngon par bstod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-10: de la 'di skad ces bya ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-11: skyes bu mchog gi 'od 'di rab bkye bas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-12: sangs rgyas zhing 'dir thams cad snang bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-13: skad cig de la ngan song gsum yang zhi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-14: nag po'i gnas kyang 'od kyis khyab par gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-15: klu yi rgyal po de yis 'od mthong nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-16: rab tu dga' ste de tshe tshig smras pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-17: gser gyi mdog gi 'od kyis khyab par gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-18: de ring sangs rgyas 'byung du gdon mi za //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-19: klu mo khrag khrig dag gis mdun bdar te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-20: gdugs dang me tog gos mchog thogs nas su //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-21: byang chub sems dpa' de ni ga lar song //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-22: phyag byas mchod pa byas nas gus bcas 'dug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-23: sa kun rin chen me tog rnams kyis gang zhing de tshe mdzes par brgyan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-24: shing mchog kun dang sman dang rtsva rnams de dag byang chub shing la 'dud //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:230b-25: 'di na yod pa'i chu klung thams cad mi 'babs mkha' la rlung mi ldang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-0: de ring bdud btul nas ni 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon @231a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-2: srid pa gsum na brgya byin tshangs pa nyi ma zla ba'i 'od mi snang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-3: mtshungs med khyod kyi 'od kyis reg nas de ring ngan song gsum po zhi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-4: bdag gi gnas su 'od byung nas ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston par byed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-5: de ring rgyal ba byon par 'gyur gyi dgyes mdzod rangs shing tshim par bskyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-6: bum pa gang ba 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la bskor ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-7: rtsva sha'i tshogs rnams 'di dag nam mkhar song ste khyod la bskor ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-8: lhar bcas mir bcas 'jig rten dag kyang mchod par brtson par gnas pa la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-9: de ring 'gro ba'i sbyin gnas 'gyur zhing shes rab 'dod pa'i lam du 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-10: bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis rnyed pa legs rnyed gzi brjid tshe ldan pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-11: mi mchog 'khor ba 'jig dang de bzhin gsher thub bcas ni bya ba mchod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-12: mi mchog 'od srung dang ni sh'akya'i mchog khyod de ring bdag gis mchod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-13: bdag ni sangs rgyas dpa' mthong ma bral byang chub dam pa don du gnyer //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-14: sa ni grum zhing ri rnams g-yos la 'gro ba thams cad med gyur srid //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-15: su zhig byang chub tu ni sems nges lhag pa'i bsam pas 'phags gyur pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-16: de ni de ring stobs bcu ldan par mi 'gyur gnas ni mchis ma lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231a-17: sengge'i sgra bsgrags tshangs pa'i dbyangs can bcom ldan 'dren pa gsung phyung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-0: de @231b nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba de klu'i bu mo rab tu mang pos bskor cing mdun du bdar nas gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-1: ras bcos bu sna tshogs thogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-2: mu tig gi rgyan phreng sna tshogs thogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-3: nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-4: lha dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-5: pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-6: sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs len pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rin po che me tog sna tshogs kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-7: byang chub sems dpa' 'od ba la mthor zhing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-8: 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi dngang mi snyengs bag mi tsha //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-9: mi zhum mi dman rab dgyes mi chags mi mnga' ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-10: sdang dang rmongs dang brkam pa mi mnga' chags bral ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-11: rnam grol drang srong chen po khyed la phyag 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-12: dogs bral zug rdu bral zhing dul la ma rig sel //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-13: 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las rab tu 'grel //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-14: gnas dang skyabs dang gling ma mchis pa mkhyen nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-15: gnas khyod skyabs khyod 'jig rten gsum po dag tu byung //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-16: ji ltar lha yi tshogs rnams dad cing rab dga' ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-17: mkha' las me tog char chen rab tu 'bebs pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-18: ji ltar gos chen dag kyang 'dor ba bgyid lags na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:231b-19: drang srong chen po mgon po rgyal bar deng 'gyur snyam //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-0: dgyes bskyed shing dbang drung gshegs mi snyengs bzhugs mdzod @232a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-1: la; ;bdud sde pham par mdzad de nyon mongs dra ba drol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-2: ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-3: de ltar byang chub rab mchog zhi ba 'tshang rgyar mdzod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-4: gang gi ched du khyed kyis bskal pa bye mang du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-5: 'gro ba de dag dgrol phyir dka' ba rnams kyang spyad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-6: khyod kyi dgongs pa de rdzogs shing dbang drung gshegs te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-7: byang chub mchog la reg; par mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas nas byung nas byang chub snying po ga la ba der song ste 'gro ba na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-11: lam gyi g-yas rol na rtsva 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtsva brda zhing 'dug ba des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du phyogs par mthong ste; lha rnams kyis bskul nas rtsva 'jam ba shin tu gzhon pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-14: rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu dga' ba 'khyil ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-16: kha dog dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-18: ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba spar gang blangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-19: byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-20: rtsva spar gang byang chub sems dpa' la byin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232a-21: bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-0: khyod rtsva 'tshong bkra shis pa mi snga mi 'phyi @232b bar byang chub tu sems bskyed cing rtsva yang byin no snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-2: de ni rtsva 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-3: ji ltar kho bo bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying por khri shom pa bzhin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-6: kho bos mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-8: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-9: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-10: de'i gsung rab la dge slong stong thams pa tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-11: bcom ldan 'das des khyed cag bskal pa bzang po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-12: zhes de dag lung bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:232b-13: de'i tshe na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyi du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag lung bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-0: bskal pa bzang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub @233a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-1: kyi snying por 'gro ba na sengge'i khri byi dor bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yan snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-4: yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-6: rtsva 'tshong bkra shis pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-8: khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang rtsva 'tshong bkra shis pa'i sngon gyi smon lam 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-9: sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-10: dbang po yongs su smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du de kha cig la ni rtsva spar gang 'bul bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-11: kha cig la ni rin po che bkod pa'i sengge'i khri 'bul bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po'i shing drung du song ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-14: byang chub kyi snying po'i lha rnams lha'i bu mo me tog gi skon bu thogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-16: phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa khri dang lhan cig tu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-17: byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-22: byug pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la gtor te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233a-23: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-0: bdag nyid chen po mi snyengs dpa' zhing @233b dul zhi ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-1: dgyes shing tshim pa brtan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-2: 'bar ba nyams dgyes kha na ma tho mi mnga' ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-3: skyon las grol ba'i ston pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-4: sdug bsngal chen por bying ba mgon med 'gro 'di la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-5: khyod ni bde ba rab tu stsol ba'i mgon po gcig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-6: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs nad rnams spang ba'i phyir phyung ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-7: sman pa'i rgyal chen grags ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo; ;ji ltar lha tshogs dad cing rab tu dga' ba yis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-8: lha yi me tog char pa rab tu 'bebs pa las //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-9: bdud dgra sde dang bcas pa byams pas bcom nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-10: khyod kyis byang chub dam pa de ring brnyes su nges //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-11: shing dbang drung du gshegs te khri der bzhugs nas su //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-12: bdud btul nas ni mun pa thams cad gzhom par mdzod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-13: ji ltar sngon gyi thub dbang de dag sangs rgyas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-14: de ltar byang chub zhi ba mchog rab 'tshang rgyar mdzod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-15: ji ltar khyod kyis 'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-16: bskal pa bye bar dka' mdzad rnam par dag 'gyur ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-17: drang srong chen po khyod kyi dgongs mchog deng rdzogs kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-18: shing dbang drung du bzhugs te byang chub 'tshang rgyar mdzod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:233b-20: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtsva spar gang khyer nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234a-0: @234a *// byang chub sems dpa' rtsva'i gding ba bting ma thag tu //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234a-1: de nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong gis sengge'i khri sna tshogs blta na sdug pa /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234a-15: mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234a-16: byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o ////

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234b-1: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'khod pa'i bdud bye ba phrag bzhi brgya la reg go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234b-2: 'od des de dag la reg ma thag tu rang rang gi gnas na 'khod bzhin du spu zing zhes byed de /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234b-6: byang chub sems dpa' ma gcig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur grang snyam ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:234b-8: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mthong ngo //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:235a-0: @235a *// kho ra yug tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong bkang nas byang chub kyi shing drung du dong ngo //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:235b-9: sdig can khyed ni phub ma spar gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:239a-11: byang chub brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:239a-12: sku ma bsnyel tam zhes snyun gsol to //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:239b-17: rgyal po chen po bzhi dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:239b-18: gling bzhi pa 'di nas ji ltar dong ba de bzhin du gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya nas rgyal po bye ba phrag bzhi brgya lhung bzed rnams thogs te; de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du dong ngo //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag gi lhung bzed du gsol lo snyam du sems @240a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-1: te; de dag dga' ba dang /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-4: de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas tshong pa ga gon dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-6: gzhan yang lha'i bu drug khri de bzhin gshegs pa'i thog ma'i zhal zas thogs nas dong bar gyur te /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-8: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la thog mar zhal zas phul nas dga' ba dang /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-11: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-12: thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob pa las byang chub brnyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240a-13: de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i bar du sems can gyi don mdzad pa de ni rab tu mang gi /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:240b-10: tshangs pa gtsug phud can nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab kyi /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-1: bshad pa na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
