K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-3: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-6: bdag gis de skad ces bstan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-7: gcig tu ma gyur lags sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-8: 'on te de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa dang rjes su mthun pa'am gcig tu lta'ang lags sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-10: de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni zab lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba ni zab ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-13: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs nges par dgongs pa ni zab pa lags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-17: bdag gis gang bstan pa de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bdag gis lus la gnas pa lags kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-18: 'di bdag gi rtsal gyis ni ma lags par 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; gsang pa pa'i bdag po /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-21: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244a-22: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-0: gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i @244b phyir chos smra ba de dag thams cad kyi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-3: gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-4: gang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs par sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba smra ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid dang mthun pa de ni gnas ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis ma brlabs pa rnams kyis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba shes par ram /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-10: bshad par nus pa su zhig yod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-11: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni mchog tu yang dag pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid ni de kho na'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa ni yang dag pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid yang dag par smra bas smra ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-18: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-20: rab tu bshad do; ;gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:244b-21: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-0: yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par 'gyur @245a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-2: ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni mgo bos bsgyel ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-3: phrag ba la thogs par nus kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par ram /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-6: yid ches par yang mi nus na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-8: kun chub par bya bar ram /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-10: sbyor bar bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-11: de ni gnas ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-13: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-14: mos pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin pa nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-15: sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-17: skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-18: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-19: theg pa chen po 'di la nges par byas par rig par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-21: skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-26: sangs rgyas bcu la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-27: gsang ba pa'i bdag po; sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-28: yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245a-29: theg pa chen po 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-0: de nas bcom @245b ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-3: nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-4: nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gang lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-5: gang nye bar zhi bas nye bar zhi ba zhes bgyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-9: nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-10: nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni kun du rtog pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-12: yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-15: yongs su rtog pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-16: 'du shes yid la byed pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-17: phyin ci log nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-18: rgyu dang dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma rig pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-19: srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-21: srid pa'i sred pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-22: nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:245b-24: nga yir 'dzin pa nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming dang gzugs nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-1: nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni chad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-2: rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-4: rtag par lta ba nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-6: de ltar na dmigs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-8: lta ba dang ldan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-9: 'jig tshogs la lta ba nya bar zhi na lta ba thams cad nye bar zhi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-10: 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na smon pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-11: 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-15: shing gi rtsa ba bcad na yal ga dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-17: yal ga phre'u thams cad skam par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-19: de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-21: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su mi shes na nye bar len pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-22: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-23: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes par gyur na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-25: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ste; gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-26: zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246a-28: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su 'tshal pa ji lta bu lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @246b pa; zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-1: bdag kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-2: sems can kun nas mi slong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-3: srog dang gang zag tu lta ba kun nas mi slong ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-5: lta ba de ni nang na yang mi gnas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-6: phyi rol na yang mi gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-7: lta ba gnas pa med pa de la mi gnas par shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-9: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-11: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig bla dvags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-12: stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pas lta ba de mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa 'di yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-14: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-18: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-20: skye ba med pa'i lta bas 'jig tshogs zhes bya ba'i lta ba de mi 'dzin pa 'di yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-22: 'jig tshogs la lta ba yongs su shes pa'o /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-24: 'jig tshogs zhes bya ba de ni tshogs ma yin pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-26: rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-27: de ni gzod ma nyid nas byung ba ma yin pa kun brtags pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-28: 'byung ba ma yin zhing kun brtags pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su brtag pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-29: rnam par brtag pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:246b-30: yongs su brtag pa ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-0: rnam par brtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba ma yin @247a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-2: rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-4: shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-5: bya ba ma yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-6: rnam par bsgrub pa ma yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-7: bslang ba ma yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-8: shes par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-10: nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba gang nye bar zhi bas zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bgyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-12: dmigs pas sems 'bar bar byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-13: gang phyis dmigs par mi byed pa de mi 'bar ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-14: mi 'bar na nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-20: de bzhin du dmigs pa las sems 'bar gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-21: dmigs pa med na zhi bar 'gyur ro ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-22: bam po bdun pa; ;zhi ba'i blo gros /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-23: de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa nye bar zhi ba nyid du yang rab tu shes la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'ang zhi bar mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-25: nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang mi bskyed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-26: pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa yang bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-27: bdud dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dmigs pa yang spong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247a-28: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos la dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-0: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa la dmigs pa yang mi @247b len la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la dmigs pa yang mi 'dor ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-2: stong pa nyid du dmigs pa la yang rab tu rtog la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-3: sems can thams cad snying rje chen po'i dmigs par yang blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-5: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa ni dmigs pa la dbang thob ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-6: ma skyes pa'i dmigs pa la yang nges par sems la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-7: bsam bzhin du skye ba'i dmigs pa yang mi spong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-8: mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dmigs pa la yang 'jug la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i dmigs pa yang nyams 'og tu chud par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-10: mtshan ma med pa'i dmigs pa la yang spyod la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-11: byang chub kyi sems kyi dmigs pa yang chud mi gson to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-12: smon pa med pa'i dmigs pa yang rnam par mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-13: khams gsum pa'i dmigs pa la yang mi smod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-14: shes rab dang thabs las nges par byung ba de ni dmigs pa thams cad la dbang byed par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-15: de mi sdug pa la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sdug pa la sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-16: mi rtag pa la dmigs nas 'khor ba la sems yongs su mi skyo ba nyid du sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-17: sdug bsngal la dmigs nas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la dgod par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:247b-18: bdag med pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-1: chags la dmigs nas sems can 'dod chags la spyod pa rnams la mi sdug pa'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-2: zhe sdang la dmigs nas sems can zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la byams pa chen po'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-3: gti mug la dmigs nas sems can gti mug la spyod pa rnams la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-4: cha mnyam pa la dmigs nas sems can cha mnyam pa la spyod pa rnams la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis sman chen po yang dag par bstan par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-5: 'dod chags dang bral ba la dmigs nas nyan thos su 'dul bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-6: zhe sdang dang bral ba la dmigs nas rang sangs rgyas su 'dul bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-7: gti mug dang bral ba la dmigs nas byang chub sems dpar 'dul bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-8: gzugs la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-9: sgra la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dbyangs thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248a-10: dri la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri bsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-0: ro la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya bar @248b sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-1: reg bya la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-2: chos la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems nges par sems pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-3: sbyin pa la dmigs nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-4: tshul khrims la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-5: bzod pa la dmigs nas tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-6: gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i pags pa thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-7: brtson 'grus la dmigs nas sems can thams cad bsgral bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-8: bsam gtan la dmigs nas mngon par shes pa bskyed par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-9: shes rab la dmigs nas sems can thams cad kyi lta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-10: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyun gcod par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-11: byams pa la dmigs nas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-12: snying rje la dmigs nas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-13: dga' ba la dmigs nas chos bstan pa la mchog tu dga' bar bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-14: btang snyoms la dmigs nas sems can rjes su chags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:248b-15: khong khro ba spong ba la sbyar bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-0: bsdu ba'i dngos po la dmigs nas @249a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-1: sems can yongs su smin par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-2: ser sna'i skyon la dmigs nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-3: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi skyon la dmigs nas tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-4: gnod sems kyi skyon la dmigs nas bzod pa'i stobs dang des pa la sems gnas so; ;le lo'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-5: g-yeng ba'i skyon la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-6: 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi skyon la dmigs nas chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-7: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byas nas theg pa chen po la yang dag par bsgrub par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-8: yid 'byung ba yid la byas nas sdig pa thams cad mi bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-9: ngan 'gro ngan song yid la byas nas ngan 'gro dang ngan song dang mi khom par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-10: lha yid la byas nas 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud par 'gyur bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249a-11: mi yid la byas nas snying po blang bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-0: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang phrad par bya bar sems @249b gnas so;/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-1: chos rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas slob dpon chos la dpe mkhyud med par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-2: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-3: gtong ba rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas gtong ba thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-4: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas smon pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-6: byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-7: lha rjes su dran pa yid la byas nas lha thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la gnas par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-8: lus yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-9: ngag yid la byas nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung thob par bya bar sems gnas so; ;sems yid la byas nas sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'i sems thob par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-10: 'dus byas la dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-11: 'dus ma byas la dmigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya bar sems gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-13: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yid la mi byed pa'i dmigs pa de gang yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:249b-14: byang chub sems dpa' de'i dmigs pa thams cad ni byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-1: cad byang chub kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sa las skye ba ni skye ba ji ltar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyad par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-7: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub kyi phyir yongs su spyad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-8: byang chub kyi phyir phan 'dogs par mi mthong ba'i dmigs pa gang yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-12: gzugs gang ci yang rung ste de thams cad ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-14: de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dmigs pa gang ci yang rung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-15: de thams cad ni byang chub kyi rnam pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-17: sems can gang dag 'jungs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-18: byas pa mi gzo ba de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-19: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-20: sems can gang dag khro ba la spyod ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-21: le lo can de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-22: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250a-23: sems can gang dag glen pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-0: rmongs pa de dag @250b las byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-2: sems can gang dag phan mi 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems su mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-3: sems can gang dag phan 'dogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su chags pa'i sems su mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-4: sems can gang dag bsngags pa brjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' khengs par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-5: sems can gang dag bsngags pa mi brjod pa de dag la yang byang chub sems dpa' sro shi bar mi 'gyur ro; ;sems can gang dag sdug bsngal ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po skye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-6: sems can gang dag bde ba de dag la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-8: sems can gang dag gdul dka' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-9: dmu rgod de dag la byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas kyi sems skye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-10: sems can gang dag cang shes pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba'i blo skye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-11: sems can gang dag rkyen gyi stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su bsrung ba'i blo skye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:250b-12: sems can gang dag rgyu'i stobs can yin pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chad pas bcad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-0: sems can gang dag zur tsam gyis go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas zab mo'i gtam brjod @251a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-2: sems can gang dag rnam par spros pas go ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-3: sems can gang dag bkri dgos ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas gtam go rims su phab ste brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-4: sems can gang dag tshig lhur len pa de dag la tshig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-5: yi ge bsnyungs te gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-6: gang dag zhi gnas sngon du 'gro ba de dag la lhag mthong gi gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-7: gang dag lhag mthong sngon du 'gro ba de dag la ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-8: gang dag tshul khrims la chags pa de dag la mthar phyin pa ma yin pas yang sems can dmyal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-9: sems can gang dag thos pa la chags pa de dag la 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-10: sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin la chags pa de dag la shes rab la 'jug pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-11: sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chags pa de dag la sems dben par bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-12: gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-13: yo byad bsnyungs pa la chags pa de dag la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251a-14: gang dag gti mug chung ba de dag la thos pas snang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-0: gang dag 'dod chags kyis non pa de dag la mi sdug pa'i gtam brjod par @251b bya'o; ;gang dag zhe sdang gis non pa de dag la byams pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-1: gang dag gti mug gis non pa de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-2: sems can gang dag cha mnyam pa la spyod pa de dag la skabs skabs su gtam rgyas par brjod par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-6: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-7: sems can gang dag rjes su mthun pa'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi gtam brjod par bya /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-8: lhag pa'i sems kyi gtam brjod par bya; lhag pa'i shes rab kyi gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-9: gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la dben pa'i gtam gyis rjes su mthun par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-10: sems can gang dag sma dbab pas 'dul ba de dag la gdong bsgyur te phyis chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-11: gang dag rgyun mi 'chad par bstan pas 'dul ba de dag la rtag par rgyun du bstan par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-12: dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la ni chos kyi gtam brjod par mi bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-13: gang dag sna tshogs kyi gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rtogs pa brjod pa gtan la phab pa bstan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-14: dpe dgod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:251b-15: sems can gang dag zab mo'i gtam gyis 'dul ba de dag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gtam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-0: @252a *// sems can med pa'i gtam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-1: gang zag med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-2: lta bar bying ba rnams la stong pa nyid kyi gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-3: rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa rnams la mtshan ma med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-4: sems can smon lam la spyod pa rnams la smon pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-5: phung po la gnas pa rnams la sgyu ma'i chos kyi gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-6: khams la gnas pa rnams la rab tu dben pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-7: skye mched la gnas pa rnams la rmi lam lta bu'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-8: 'dod pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la kun tu 'bar ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-9: gzugs kyi khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-10: gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-11: sdug bsngal gyis 'dul ba rnams la 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-12: bde bas 'dul ba rnams la bsam gtan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-13: tshad med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-14: lhas 'dul ba rnams la gcig tu bde ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-15: mtshan mas 'dul ba rnams la nga yi ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252a-16: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-0: nyan thos kyis 'dul ba rnams la @252b rjes su bstan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-1: de'i bya ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams la don nyung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-3: bya ba nyung ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-4: sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-5: snying rje chen po'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-6: spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-7: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyang ba'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-8: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-9: sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag la byang chub sems dpas ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-10: 'bras bu yod pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-12: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-13: shes rab yongs su dag cing dmigs pa la dbang thob pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-14: legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-15: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-16: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:252b-17: dmigs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-1: 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-2: kye ma gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-3: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ming ci zhes bya bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-4: de byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ci zhes bya bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-5: de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-7: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-8: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-10: kha dog tha dad pa 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-17: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas 'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par khyab par byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-18: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas slar log ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253a-19: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo @253b gros kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-1: 'od bzang dri ma mi mnga' gser dang 'dra //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-2: zla ba'i zhal 'dra zhi gnas legs par bzhugs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-3: nyi ma lta bu mun pa 'joms mdzad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-4: mi mchog ci yi slad du 'dzum pa bstan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-5: mos pa zhi gnas rdzing du rab tu bzhugs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-6: thugs rje'i chu bo brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'khrungs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-7: dran pas kha bye yon tan dri zhim ldan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-8: bde gshegs padma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-9: dran pa gnod bzang zhi gnas mar lags te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-10: snying po thugs rje dri ma gsum sel mdzad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-11: shes rab mar mes mun pa sel mdzad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-12: bde gshegs mar me ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-13: dkyil 'khor thugs rje lhag mthong 'od ldan pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-14: rab rib sel ba sred pa skam mdzad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-15: 'gro ba rgyas mdzad mig ni sbyong mdzad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-16: bde gshegs nyi ma ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-17: khyod ni 'gro ba'i bsam pa rab tu mkhyen //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-18: khyod ni lhar bcas 'gro na'ang lhang nge ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-19: drang srong chen po'i zhal du 'khor rnams la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-20: mi mchog ci slad 'dir ni 'dzum pa mdzad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-21: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:253b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-0: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje thogs nas bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par @254a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-2: dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rgyas par byed par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-4: sems can tshad med pa dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-5: de bskal pa bzang po de 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i bar gyi dam pa'i chos nub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-6: de 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba der skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa des phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa de 'dzin par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-7: don gyi tshul la yang 'jug par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-8: de bzhin nyid du yang bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-9: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-14: de dag gi gan na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-15: dam pa'i chos kyang bskul bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254a-16: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-0: de de'i 'og tu bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed @254b 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-1: bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-3: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-4: skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-5: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa de ni 'byor ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-11: lha dang mi mang pos gang dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-12: byang chub sems dpas gang bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-21: mu tig dmar pos legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-22: 'jig rten gyi khams de mig mang ris su byas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-23: lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-24: ka tsa lan da ki ltar reg na bde ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:254b-25: dar gyi lnga ldi mang pos bres pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-0: @255a *// ba dan bsgrengs pas legs par brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-2: rin po che'i me tog gis khebs par byas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-3: spos kyi snying po dam pas legs par bdugs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-4: steng gi bar snang la lha'i rol mo'i sgra len pa can du 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams de ngan song dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-6: mi khom pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ldan gyi lha'i yongs su spyod pa dang 'dra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-8: yid la bsams pas zas dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-13: rgyan grub cing legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro; ;lha dang mi thams cad kyang khang ba brtsegs pa la mtshungs par yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-14: lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang rgya chen po la mos par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-16: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos pa sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang rung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-21: theg pa gnyis kyis ming yang mi grag par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-23: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam 'ba' zhig gsung bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni 'bum phrag mang por 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255a-25: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang yang cho ga nyams pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-0: lta ba @255b nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-10: dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-11: lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad thub par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-13: lha dang mi rnams kyang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-15: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de'i yon tan tshad med pa'i rgyu'i khyad par ni 'di dang gzhan yang mang du yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa de dam chos ston par 'gyur ba de'i tshe sku las 'od phyung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-17: de nas sems can de dag gis 'od de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par 'gyur gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-19: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan du 'dong ngo snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-20: de na kha cig ni mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-21: kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-22: der lha dang mi de dag 'dus pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa de steng gi bar snang la shing ta la 'bum srid du mngon par 'phags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:255b-24: gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyil mo krung du bzhugs nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-1: thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-3: de'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston pa dang 'gal bar byed pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-4: zlog par byed pa'i sems can ni gcig kyang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-5: sems can de dag thams cad ni dbang po rno ba mgo smos pas go bar 'gyur ba sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams de na chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan gang yang med par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams de na nga yi ba med cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-8: yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-9: sems can de dag thams cad nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa de lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa gang la bsod snyoms blang bar bzhed par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs lhung bzed thogs pa nye bar gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-12: der lha'i bu'am mir gyur pa des /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs @256b pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa bdag las bshos gsol bar bzhed do snyam nas yid la bsams pas 'khor gyi khams su stan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-3: ro brgya pa'i zas sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de la gdugs tshod bab ces gsol pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-4: der de bzhin gshegs pa de bshos gsol lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-5: bshos gsol nas slar bdud par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par 'gyur ba de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bkod pas gnas par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams de ni yon tan gyi rgyu'i khyab par 'di dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-8: gzhan yang tshad med pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-9: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de kun nas yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-10: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa 'di bstan pa na srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar shog cig ces smon lam yang btab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-12: de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas yongs su dag pa der skye bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:256b-13: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rang gi lung bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-0: @257a *// rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-2: rdo rje de nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du 'phangs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-3: rdo rje de 'phangs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-4: me tog gi char yang bab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-5: rol mo'i sil snyan brgya'i sgra yang byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-6: 'khor thams cad kyi lag pa g-yas par yang me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-7: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-8: chos kyi dbang phyug rgya chen mi zad chos kyi mdzod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-9: chos rnams rab tu 'byed la mkhas pa 'gro don bzhed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-10: chos la thugs ma zhum zhing rtag tu lhug par btang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-11: chos kyi rjes mthun chos bsgrub gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-12: sems can dag pa khyod kyi ye shes spyod rnam dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-13: yon tan rgyal grags snyan pa 'jig rten gsum du grags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-14: ye shes rgyun ni dus gsum rtag tu bsam 'tshal //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-15: chags 'das zhabs mnyam legs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-16: zla ba las lhag yongs dag tshul khrims rnam par dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-17: nyi ma las lhag 'od mdzes 'od mnga' gzi brjid mchog /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-18: tshangs pa las lhag gsung snyan tshangs pa'i gsung mnga' ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257a-19: dkon mchog gsum ldan gser 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-0: @257b khyod ni sku yang ston la sku dang ldan ma lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-1: khyod ni gsung yang brjod la sgra skad rtog mi mnga'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-2: khyod ni chos kyang gsung la chos kyi 'du shes bral //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-3: sems can thar par mdzad la sems can 'du shes bral //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-4: khyod ni gang dag chos ston thos nas ji lta bstan pa ltar //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-5: sgrub pa snying po snying por gnas pa dag ni ma gtogs par //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-6: 'gro ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu byung yang ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-7: khyod kyi bka' drin lan ldon nam yang rdo mi thogs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-8: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog gi phreng ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-9: me tog gi phreng ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-10: sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog sna tshogs kyi phreng bas legs par brgyan par gyur cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-11: mig mang ris su gnas par kun du snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-12: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lung bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu drug pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so; ;gsang ba pa'i bdag po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:257b-16: rmi lam gyi rang bzhin lta bu'i lung bstan pas bdag lung bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-1: zhig thob par bya ba'i phyir khyed lung bstan /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-4: thob par bya ba med par lung bstan pa thob po /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-12: skyes bu thob pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-15: skye mched rnams thob pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-18: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-19: kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-20: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-26: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-29: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thob pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-31: gal te thob pa med na; 'dir ci zhig lung ston /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-33: mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ye shes lung bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-37: gang gnyis kyis rab tu ma phye ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-39: gal te gnyis kyis rab tu phye bar gyur na lung bstan pa thob par mi 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-40: gang gi phyir ye shes gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa de'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i lung bstan pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258a-42: gal te ye shes gnyis su med pas rab phye ba yin na lung ston pa ni su zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-2: lung ston pa gang yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-3: su la lung ston pa de dag na mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-4: de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-7: gnyis su med pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de la lung bstan du ci yod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-9: mtha' gang yin pa de gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-10: mtha' de nyid du lung bstan pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-12: gang la gnas na lung bstan pa thob pa'i mtha' gang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-14: bdag gi mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-17: gang zag gi mtha' la gnas na lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-18: bdag gi mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-20: bdag gi mtha'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i mtha'i gnas ni ma rig pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-25: srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-28: srid pa'i sred pa'i mtha'i gnas gang gi gnas yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-30: shin tu ma skyes ma byung ba'i mtha'i gnas so; ;smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-32: ma byung ba'i gnas gang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-34: rnam par rig pa ma yin pa'i mtha' ni gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:258b-36: rnam par rig pas ci zhig rig par byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-1: pa; gal te rnam par rig par byed na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-2: rnam par rig pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-4: ci zhig rnam par rig par mi byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-6: rnam par rig pa thams cad rnam par rig par mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-8: gal te rnam par rig par mi byed na ji ltar kun shes par byed /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-10: gal te kun shes par byed na rnam par rig par byed pa ma yin te; gang gi phyir rnam par rig par mi byed pa de'i phyir kun shes par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-12: kun shes par byed pa ji lta bu yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-14: gang gi tshe rnam par rig pa khas mi len pa'o; ;smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-15: ji ltar na rnam par rig pa khas mi len /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-17: gang gi tshe tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-19: ji ltar na tshig 'bru'i rjes su mi rgyug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-21: gang gi tshe don la rton pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-23: don la rton pa ji lta bu yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-25: gang gi tshe don mi mthong ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-27: don mi mthong ba ji lta bu yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-29: gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-31: gang gi tshe don dang don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur pa de'i tshe ci zhig don du gnyer bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-34: don ma yin pa don du mi gnyer bar gyur ba de'i tshe chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259a-36: gal te chos don du gnyer bar gyur na de don du gnyer ba nyid ma yin nam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-1: chos don du gnyer ba ni ci yang don du gnyer ba ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-3: gang gis gang don du gnyer ba de ni chos ma yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-7: smras pa; gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-9: gang la chos kyi sgra yang mi dmigs pa de la chos gang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-12: gang la yi ge rnams kun du mi 'byung ba de nyid chos yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-13: de bas na chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-17: su zhig bdag smra'o zhes smras pa de 'chal par smra ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-18: gang 'chal par smra ba de la chos med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-22: gang chos gsung ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'chal bar gsung bar mi 'gyur ram /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-25: de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-26: ma brjod do zhes kho bos sngar ma bshad dam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-27: de lta mod kyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sems can rnams kyis dmigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-29: smras na nyes pa ci yod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-31: ngag gi las kyi nyes par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-33: ngag gi las las nyes pa ci zhig 'byung /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-34: smras pa; yi ge la sems pas bklags pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-36: nyes pa med pa gang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:259b-39: mi brjod pa de la rnam par rig pa gang yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-1: rig pa med pa ni nyes pa med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-2: gang bdag la rnam par rig par mi byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-3: gzhan la rnam par rig par mi byed pa de nyes pa med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-5: nyes pa'i rtsa ba gang yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-7: nyes pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dzin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-11: mngon par zhen pa ni rtsa ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-13: mngon par zhen pa'i rtsa ba ci yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-15: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa ni rtsa ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-17: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun btags pa'i rtsa ba ci yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-19: lhag par dmigs pa'i lta ba ni rtsa ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-21: ci zhig la lhag par dmigs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-28: chos rnams la lhag par dmigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-30: lhag par mi dmigs pa ji lta bu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-32: gal te sred pa'i bag la nyal la lhag par mi dmigs pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-34: de lta bas na sred pa la dmigs pa spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-35: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-36: byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgya ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260a-37: gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-0: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag @260b bo lag na rdo rje brang pa yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pas dbugs phyin pa thob ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-1: tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' ste dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-2: yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-3: bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang thabs gcig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-4: nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa bdag gi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs shing dgung bdun zhig bzhugs par ci gnang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-5: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-7: lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-12: lto 'phye chen po mang du mchis te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-13: sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gnas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-14: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing chos kyang thos na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-20: des na yang khro ba dang sdang ba'i sems ma mchis par 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-21: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i g-yog 'khor gang lags pa de dag gi yun ring po'i don dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:260b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-0: sems can tshad med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel ba @261a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-2: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i bsam pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-3: nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gshegs te zhag bdun bzhugs par gnang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-4: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad par rig nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der song ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-7: rang gi gnas su phyin to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-8: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di snyam du bsams te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-9: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir ci nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-10: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu thams cad ngo mtshar du sems par 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261a-11: phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-0: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po byas par 'gyur @261b ba de lta bu'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa bya'o snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-1: de nas yang 'di snyam du bsams te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-2: bdag gis mngon par shes te dus gcig cig na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' khri lung bstan pa'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-4: bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya bar gshegs pa'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdag gis lha dang mi'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i bkod pa mthong gi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-8: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod par bya'o snyam mo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:261b-9: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-0: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas @262a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-1: bkod pa de'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa zhig lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi dbus na gnas par snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-2: 'khor gyi khyams de yang yangs shing rgya che ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-3: shar nub tu chur ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-4: lho byang du rgyar ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-5: sa gzhi ni bee d'urya sngon po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-6: phyir ni aa na da rnyil las byas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-7: zung gi phrugs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-8: dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi padmas brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-9: rgyan phreng sna tshogs du mas spras pa; ras bcos bu du ma bting ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-10: mu tig gi rgyan phreng du ma dbyangs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-11: dar gyi lnga lding du mas mdzes par byas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-12: me tog gi phreng ba du mas bkab pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-13: pog phor du ma nas bdugs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-14: lha'i me tog kha dog du ma dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-15: kha dog sna tshogs bkram pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-16: bkra ba blta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba lus sim par byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-18: yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-19: bsngags pa'i tshogs bstan pa tshad med pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-20: 'khor gyi khyams der seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rtsa bas brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-21: rin po che'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-22: rin po che'i padma bkod pa dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-23: mu tig gi dra bas g-yogs pa mig mang ris su bris pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262a-24: lha'i ras bcos bu dum bting ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-0: steng du rin po che'i dra bas bres @262b pa; bkod pa sngon ma mthong /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-1: ma thos pa 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na med pa brgya stong mang po byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-2: zhal zas ro bro ba brgyas bsgos pa'ang bshams so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-3: seng ge'i khri sa la mi brten pa brgya stong yang bzhag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-4: seng ge'i khri re re'i bar snang la yang rin po che'i gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog dang ldan pa dag bres so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-5: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-6: seng ge'i khri bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu byas nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-7: de'i nub mo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-8: ro bro ba mang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa bsod pa mang po yang bshams nas nam nangs pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-11: kho bos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-12: nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gsang ba pa rang gi gnas su spyan drangs na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnang gi de la khyod dpung dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-14: g-yog 'khor dang bcas par mi g-yeng ba'i sems kyis zhag bdun gyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:262b-15: rim gro bya bar spro bar gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-1: gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-8: lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-9: de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag la yang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-12: kho bos bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor 'dir spyan drangs na gshegs par gnang gi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-13: de la khyed kyis ngan sems med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-16: dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba mang pos bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-17: chos kyang nyon cig ces bsgo'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-19: de nas gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu thu bo rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-20: bzhin bzang khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-21: tshangs ris nas bzung ste 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-22: khyod kyi nang nas su lta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces spro na zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-25: zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i bu des byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263a-26: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bu gnyis pa lag bzang zhes bya ba la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-0: khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi @263b stobs kyis song la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-1: sa bla ba'i lha rnams nas bzung ste bar snang dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-3: sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-7: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams la bcom ldan 'das gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-8: khyed kyi nang nas su blta 'dod pa de myur du shog cig ces sbron cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-11: zhes te ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du gzhon nu lag bzang gis byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-12: de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-13: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong dag gis dpag tshad khri khor khor yug gi bar snang khyab par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-14: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa bshams te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-16: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-17: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod bab pa gsol pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-18: thub pa chen po dus 'di lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-19: skyes bu gtso bo gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-20: skyes bu dam pa gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-21: skyes bu cang mkhyen gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-22: thub pa chen po gdugs tshod bab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:263b-23: rkang gnyis gtso bo gshegs su gsol //
