K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-7: 'phags pa'i bden par gnas bcas te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-8: byams dang thugs rje'i spyan mnga' zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-9: bdag med pa yi sgra sgrogs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-10: rgyal ba seng ge gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-11: khrims ni rtsa ba chu ba dran //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-12: byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-13: rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-14: rgyal ba sdong po gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-15: shes rab rgya chen zab pa po //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-16: ting 'dzin chab ni grang ldan zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-17: rnal 'byor pa yi tshong pas gtams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-18: yon tan rgya mtsho gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-19: thugs rje dkyil 'khor dpal ldan pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-20: shes rab 'od zer legs par brgyan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-22: thub pa nyi ma gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-23: phas kyi rgol bas mi bskyod cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-24: rnam thar la sogs sman tshogs can //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-25: slob dang mi slob ri dvags gtams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-26: thub pa ri bo gshegs su gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i gdugs tshod bab par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264a-29: gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i gdugs tshod bab kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-0: chos gos gyon la lhung bzed @264b thogs shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-1: zhag bdun byin gyis brlab pa byin gyis rlob la gtsug lag khang gi khang skyong skos shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag ni rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bar snang la dong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-4: gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ma yin pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khrod du bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan gcig tu nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas dong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-6: nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis ni mdun du bdar /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-7: lha'i tshogs kyis ni mngon par bstod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-8: lha'i bu mo rnams ni glu dbyangs len /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-11: rol mo'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-12: zhing rnams ni g-yo bar mdzad cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-13: sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-14: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-15: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-16: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-17: sangs rgyas kyi dpal chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-18: sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:264b-19: sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-0: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor ga la ba der nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du thogs pa med par @265a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-3: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar thogs pa ni mi mnga'/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-5: zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang ni mtshungs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-6: lha'i dbang po brgya byin ltar lha'i tshogs kyis ni bskor /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-7: tshangs pa chen po ltar tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis ni bskor zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-8: mthong nas kyang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-9: rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-11: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-12: lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-16: man da ra ba chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-20: manydzu sha ka chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-34: rtag tu me tog chags dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-35: mig tu sdug pa de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265a-36: me tog gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-0: ba dan @265b dag kyang bsgreng ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-1: rol mo'i sil snyan brgya stong yang len to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu me tog gi char 'bebs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-10: ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-14: lha'i bu mo brgya stong glu len pa dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-15: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-17: nyan thos chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun khang du bzhugs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-18: bcom ldan 'das sa la bzhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshes chen po dal zhing mi drag la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-19: sems can thams cad la mi gnod par g-yos par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-20: da nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du byon par rig nas myur ba myur bar la gor du btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-25: byug pa thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te; ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:265b-29: byug pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-4: 'khor 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-5: thal mo sbyar nas btud pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi las brtsams te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-7: 'khor de ltar 'dus pa de dag la de lta bu'i gtam gyi sbyor ba mdzad pas klu dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-11: srin po'i 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags khri nyis stong gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-12: rgyal po chen po de dag gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas bud med khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-13: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-14: gnyen gyi g-yog 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-15: yon tan mtha' yas pa bkod pa'i g-yog 'khor dang bcas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-25: ba dan thams cad thogs shing sil snyan dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-27: rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa rnams dang lhan gcig tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun khang ga la ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-28: bcom ldan 'das ga la der dong ste phyin nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-0: @266b lan bdun bskor ba byas nas ji ltar thogs thogs pa'i me tog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-9: ba dan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-11: rol mo sna tshogs byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas par lhan gcig tu rang gi 'khor gyi khyams su spyan drangs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams der sa la mi brten pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-15: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa nyid kyi seng ge'i gdan ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-17: nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-18: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor yang stan ci rigs pa dag la 'khod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-19: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes brgya byin dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-21: 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-22: lha'i 'khor chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-23: khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la bsub gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-26: de ni de bzhin gshegs pas kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-27: de la gang dag yi rang dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-28: zhal ta bya bar byed pa ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-29: de dag bsod nams skal ba can //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-30: de dag yon ni chung ba min //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-32: de la grogs po dag khyed kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:266b-33: zhal ta bya ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po longs shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-0: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis @267a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-1: 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-2: seng ge'i khri bkod pa yang mthong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-3: de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-4: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-5: 'on te gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i 'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-6: su'i yin zhes ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-7: de dag gis bar snang las 'di ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'i byin gyi rlabs yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba de na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba chos ston pa der gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu mthong nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-11: gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bkod pa de nyid 'khor gyi khyams 'dir byin gyis brlabs so zhes sgra thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-12: bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i gdan de la bzhugs ma thag tu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-13: de nas de'i tshe lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnod sbyin dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-19: lto 'phye chen po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267a-21: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas thal mo sbyar te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-0: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rgyal @267b po chen po bzhi dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-1: khyed thams cad lhan gcig tu 'dus la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-3: ji ltar bshams pa'i zhal zas bcom ldan 'das la gsol cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-4: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-9: rang gi lag nas gus par bsti stang du byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-11: bca' ba bsod pa mang po ro bro ba mang po du ma dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-12: byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa'i zhal zas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bstabs te tshim par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-14: bstabs te tshim par byas nas lhung bzed bkrus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-15: bcom ldan 'das phyag bcabs par rig nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-16: lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na 'khod pa'i gnod sbyin dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-17: srin po gang yin pa de dag kyang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-18: thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'khod par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-19: lcang lo can du gshegs nas bshos gsol ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bco brgyad pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:267b-20: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-1: chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-2: phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-8: lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor 'di'i yun ring po'i don dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-13: khyad par gyis khyad par du mngon du 'phags par 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-14: nyams pa'i chos can du mi 'gyur bar de ltar chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-15: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-17: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-19: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bshad par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-20: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la zhugs na khyad par du mngon par 'phags par 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-21: nyams pa'i chos can du mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi tshul khyod la bstan par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-24: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-25: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-0: 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bsam pa @268b thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de dad pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-1: dad pa mang zhing 'phags pa rnams la lta 'dod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-2: dam pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-3: ser sna med par gtong ba gtong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-4: lag pa brkyang ste gtong ba la dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-5: mchod sbyin byed pa'i ngang can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-6: gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-7: sbyin pa 'byed pa la dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-8: khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-9: rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-10: de las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-13: som nyi med la the tshom mi za zhing yid gnyis mi za ba yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-14: de dkar po dang nag po'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za bar rig nas srog gi phyir yang mi bya ba mi byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-15: de srog gcod pa spangs pa yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-16: ma byin par len pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-17: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-24: log par lta ba spangs pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-25: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-26: de dad par gyur nas dge sbyong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-27: bram ze gang dag yang dag par song ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-28: yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-29: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-30: yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-34: thos pa la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:268b-35: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-3: ngo bzlog phod par smra zhing bcam bur mi smra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-4: dge ba'i bsam pa can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-5: mi dge ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-8: mu cor smra ba ma yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-10: dran pa nye bar gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-11: shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-12: srid pa'i tshul bcad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-15: som nyi las nges par brgal ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-16: the tshom las brgal ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-17: yang srid pa las brgal ba 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dge sbyong dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-20: bram ze dam pa de lta bu la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig nas bsten to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-23: mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-25: des dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mnyes par byas nas chos kyi gtam gyi yang dag par ston /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-28: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-29: sbyin pas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyur bar yang dag par ston /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-30: tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-31: thos pas ni shes rab chen por 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-32: bsgom pas ni 'bral bar 'gyur ba yang dag par ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-34: 'di ni sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-36: 'di ni ser sna'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269a-38: 'di ni tshul khrims kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-1: 'di ni bzod pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-3: 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-5: 'di ni bsam gtan gyi rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-7: 'di ni shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-9: 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-10: 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-11: 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-12: 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-13: 'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-14: 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-15: 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-16: 'di ni ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-17: 'di ni ngag gis nye bar spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-18: 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-19: 'di ni yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-20: 'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-21: 'di ni yid kyi nye bar spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-25: 'di ni bya ba ma yin pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-26: 'di ni byas na yun ring po'i don dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-31: zhes de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gi chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:269b-34: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-0: de nas de dag snod du rung bar mkhyen nas zab @270a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-2: stong pa nyid kyi gtam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-3: mtshan ma med pa'i gtam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-4: smon pa med pa'i gtam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-5: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i gtam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-11: gang zag med pa'i gtam rab tu ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-12: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo'i gtam 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-16: 'di med pa'i phyir 'di 'gag pa 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-17: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-18: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-19: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-20: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-21: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-22: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-23: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-24: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-25: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-26: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-27: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-33: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-36: 'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270a-37: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-0: rnam par shes pa 'gags @270b pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-1: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-2: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-8: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-14: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-15: de la don dam par ni 'byung ba'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-16: 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-18: chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-26: rjes su 'jug pa'i chos gang yang med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-27: gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-28: kun du gti mug pas khams gsum pa 'dogs par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-29: nyon mongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-30: las kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-31: sdug bsngal gyi rjes su 'jug pa'i 'dogs pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:270b-32: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du gti mug pa de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su brtags na chos gang yang chos gang gi byed pa por 'gyur ba med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-0: gang la byed pa po mi dmigs pa de la 'jug @271a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-1: pa med ldog pa med do zhes brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-2: der chos zab mo'i gtam de lta bu thos nas som nyi med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-4: chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'jug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-5: de gzugs la mi chags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-9: rnam par shes pa la mi chags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-12: mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-19: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-20: chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-21: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben par yid ches so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-23: de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-24: dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-25: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-26: de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-28: dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-30: der skyes nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsam par 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-31: dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271a-32: de brtson 'grus brtsams pas khyim gyi gnas don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-3: zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su 'dzin pas yongs su spyod pa don du gnyer bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-4: de na tshod gzhon nur rnam par rtse ba la mi dga' bas na tshod mdzes pa la bab pa'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par myur tu rab tu 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-5: de dad pas rab tu byung nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-6: dge ba'i grogs po dge ba thob par byed pa rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-8: de dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i chos rnams nyan to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-9: sgrub pa snying por byed kyi tshig lhur len pa'i blo dang ldan pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-10: mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-11: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis 'thob pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-13: tshigs su bcad pa la mi re bar /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-14: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-15: bdag gi tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar gzhan dag la chos mi ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-16: de ji ltar thos pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-17: ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gzhan dag la chos ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-18: chos nyan pa rnams la ni byams pa chen po thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-19: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-20: de mang du thos par gyur pas lus dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-21: srog la mi lta ba yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:271b-28: bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-0: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams @272a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-1: kyi don la yongs su rtog pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-2: don la rton pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-3: tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-6: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-7: bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtson pa ma yin gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-8: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-9: bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-10: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su tshol lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-11: bag yod pa lhur len pa yang yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-12: de la bag yod pa gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-15: de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-16: de gzugs rnams kyi ro myang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-18: 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-19: de bzhin du rna bas sgra rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-22: lus kyis reg bya rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-23: yid kyis chos rnams shes nas mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-24: chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-26: 'byung ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-27: 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-28: gzhan yang bag yod pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-29: gzhan gyi sems rjes su bsrung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-30: nyon mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-31: chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-32: 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272a-33: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-0: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba @272b med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-1: mi dge ba'i rtsa ba chags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-3: gti mug gi rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-4: lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-5: ngag gis nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-6: yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-7: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-8: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rgyu ba med pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-9: 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-11: de ltar na bag yod par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-12: bag yod pa dang ldan pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-16: chos don du gnyer ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-19: dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni 'jig rten pha rol tu ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-20: de'i sems nyes par spyod pa la mi 'gro'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-21: 'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-23: gzhan yang chos spyod pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni chos dang ldan par 'gro ba yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-24: sangs rgyas mthong ba rnams mnyes par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-28: che ba nyid thob nas che ba nyid 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:272b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-0: gzhan yang bde ba thob par 'dod pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis shin @273a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-2: bde ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la brtson par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-4: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'ongs pa'i 'khor 'di ji ltar lhang nge ba la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-6: de dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir shin tu brtson par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-8: ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-10: bag yod par gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-11: de la bag yod pa ni sems rjes su bsrung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-13: 'dod pa la dga' ba rnam par spong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-14: chos kyi dga' ba la bsten pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-15: 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-16: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-17: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-18: mi dge ba'i rnams dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-21: gti mug rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-24: yid kyi gnas ngan len rnams kyi rgyu ba med pa nas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rgyu ba med pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273a-25: 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-0: su dad pa dang ldan @273b zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa des brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-1: dad par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-5: brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des dran pa dang shes bzhin la brtson par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-6: dran pa dang shes bzhin des byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad chung za bar mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-12: shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-14: tshul bzhin sbyor ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so; ;gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-15: de la yod pa ni gang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-16: med pa ni gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-17: yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-19: de la med pa gang zhe na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-20: log par sbyor ba dang ldan pa la ni 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-21: de ni med pa zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-23: rnam par smin pa ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-24: gang las de dang rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa de ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:273b-25: gzhan yang kun rdzob tu mig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-0: @274a *// gang mig nas yid kyi bar dang ldan pa ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-1: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa la ni byang chub yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-2: le lo can la ni byang chub med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-3: phyin ci log las byung ba'i phung po lnga dag ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-4: rgyu med pa las chos 'byung ba ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-5: gzhan yang mi rtag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-7: 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi gzugs ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-10: ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-11: yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i gzugs de ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-12: de bzhin du mi rtag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-14: 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi tshor ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-17: rnam par shes pa ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-22: yang dag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa de ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-23: gzhan yang ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-24: ma rig pa med na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de dag med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-25: 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-26: 'du byed rnams med na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-27: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274a-28: gzugs zhes bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-0: rnam par shes pa med na ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni med @274b do; ;ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-1: ming dang gzugs med na skye mched drug ces bya ba de med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-2: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-3: skye mched drug med na reg pa zhes bya ba de med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-4: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-5: reg pa med na tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-6: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba de yin yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-7: tshor ba med na sred pa zhes bya ba de med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-8: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-9: sred pa med na len pa zhes bya ba de med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-10: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-11: len pa med na srid pa zhes bya ba de med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-12: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba de ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-13: srid pa med na skye ba zhes bya ba de ni med do; ;skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-19: skye ba med na rga shi dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-25: gzhan yang sbyin pas longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-26: sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-27: tshul khrims kyis mtho ris su skye ba ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-28: tshul khrims kyis ngan song du skye ba ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:274b-29: thos pas shes rab chen por 'gyur ba ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-0: @275a *// thos pas shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-1: bsgoms pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-2: bsgoms pas 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-3: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-4: nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-5: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral na nyon mongs pa 'byung ba ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-6: mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la ni kun shes pa brda sprod pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-7: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa la ni mya ngan las 'das pa yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-8: gzhan yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i stong pa nyid ni yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-9: nang gi rjes su song ba'i bdag ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-10: ye shes dang ldan pa la ni thar pa yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-11: nga rgyal dang ldan pa la ni 'byung ba med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-15: gang zag ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-17: de ltar na bag yod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-18: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la yod par grags pa gang yin pa de ni yod par rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-19: 'jig rten na mkhas pa rnams la med par grags pa gang yin pa de ni med par rab tu shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-20: de yod do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275a-21: med do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa la yang mi chags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-0: sangs rgyas bcom @275b ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa yang dag pa'i don rjes su rtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-2: de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mdor bsdus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-3: chos kyi mdo bzhi rnam par bzhag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-6: bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-7: lha tshe ring po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-8: lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-9: mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir chos thams cad la bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-10: rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-12: mi rtag ces bya ba de ni shin tu mi rtag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-13: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de ni smon pa dang bral ba'i tshig bla dvags so; ;bdag med ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba de ni mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba'i tshig bla dvags so; ;gsang ba pa'i bdag po /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:275b-15: de ltar na chos thams cad la de ltar mos shing tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-0: dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs @276a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-1: kyi chos rnams las mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-5: rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag 'jig rten skyong pa zhes bgyi na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-7: bdag cag gi ji ltar 'jig rten skyong bar bgyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-10: khyed kyis chos kyi bya bas 'jig rten skyongs shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-11: de la dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-12: bcu gang zhe na; 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-13: srog gcod pa spong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-14: rang gi longs spyod kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-15: gzhan gyi chung ma la mi 'phyo ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-16: chos spyod pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang gzhan gyi 'khor mi 'byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-19: tshig tsam ji lta ba bzhin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-21: gzhan gyi longs spyod la 'dod pa med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-22: gnod sems nye bar zhi ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276a-23: lta ba yongs su dag cing yang dag par song ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-0: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar @276b byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-2: gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos brgyad de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-5: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-6: bla ma la gus pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-7: thams cad du mthun par 'dzin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-10: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-11: sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-14: chos brgyad po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-16: gzhan yang yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa drug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-20: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-21: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i lus kyi las kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-23: yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-29: ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba dang po'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-30: de bzhin du ston pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-31: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-32: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i ngag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-33: yid kyi las 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:276b-35: yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-4: ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba gnyis pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-6: rnyed pa gang dag chos dang mthun pa'i chos kyis rnyed pa tha na lhung bzed kyi nang du chud pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-7: lhung bzed par gtogs pa de lta bu'i rnyed pa dag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa thabs mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rnyed pa mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-9: yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-15: ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba bzhi pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-19: bsra bsre ma yin pa rang dbang can /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-22: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i tshul khrims rnams kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig tu tshul khrims mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277a-25: yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-5: ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba lnga pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-6: lta ba gang 'phags pa nges par 'byung ba nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-7: sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa nges par 'byung ba'i lta ba de lta bus tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu lta ba mthun par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i chos dga' bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-9: yid du 'ong bar byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-15: ting nge 'dzin du bya bar 'gyur ba drug pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-17: yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'i chos drug po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-19: gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos bzhi ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-25: 'dod pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-26: zhe sdang gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-27: gti mug gis 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:277b-28: 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par mi 'gro ba ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-0: 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba spangs pa'i chos bzhi po 'di dag @278a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-1: ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-3: gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos gnyis te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-8: chos gnyis po de dag ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-10: gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'i chos ni gcig kho na ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-12: bden pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-13: bka' blo bde ba ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-14: gya gyu med pa ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-16: chos gcig po de ni 'jig rten skyong bar byed pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-18: de lta bu'i chos la brtson na 'jig rten skyong bar byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-20: khyed kyis chos de lta bu la brtson pas 'jig rten skyongs shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-21: 'jig rten skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-23: gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag brjod pas 'khor 'di thams cad dge ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag ngas 'khor 'di la brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278a-25: snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-0: ngas klu'i @278b rgyal po sogs ma med kyi gnas su gsang sngags kyi tshig gang dag smras pa de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-1: byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par 'dug nas 'gro ba la phan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-2: bde ba'i phyir ngas sems kyis dran pas gang dag smras pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-8: gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag la khyod spobs par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-9: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stan las langs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tsog tsog por 'dug nas lag pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-11: gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-15: hu la ra n'a aa gu h'a /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-22: ha hu la hu ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-24: ki na aa bhi shi ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-26: dza dza dza dza ma ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-28: ni b'a tr'a; barta barta aa nu s'a n'i /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-30: smri ti ho: ma nu sh'a nu smri ti ho /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-31: de b'a nu smri ti ho /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-37: sv'a stir bha bantu sarba satv'a nam/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-38: bhi ki ran tu mah'a parba ta /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-41: gardza tu sa mu dra be ga /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:278b-43: gsang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i gnas thams cad rab tu g-yos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:279a-1: thams cad kyang rab tu g-yos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:279a-2: rgya mtsho chen po yang rab tu 'khrugs so //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:297b-4: de la skye ba ci yang med do //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:297b-13: gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /
