K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-12: skye ba med pa la 'jug pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-14: ma byung ba gang yin pa de la 'jug pa gang yang med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-15: de ltar na 'jug pa med pa ni rjes su 'jug pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-17: su bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de'i spobs ba rgyun gcad par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-19: rgyun chad pa med pas des chos nyid rjes su rtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-20: des chos nyid mi zad par rjes su rtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-21: des ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar chos de dag brjod cing mngon du 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-22: de chos kyi rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'di lta bu 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa la 'jug par 'jug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301a-23: sems can rnam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-0: gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @301b ni sems kyis dri ma med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-1: bsam pas rnam par dag pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-2: sbyor bas gtsang ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-3: lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon du 'phags pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-4: bsgrub pa la legs par gnas pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-5: shes rab kyis mngon du 'phags pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-6: dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud pas brtan pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-7: bdud rnams kyis mi shigs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-8: pha rol mu stegs byed rnams kyi mi 'dus pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-9: nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi rdzi ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-10: phyir rgol ba rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-11: lus kyi stobs dang ldan pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-12: sems kyis zhum pa med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-13: spobs pa mi zad pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-14: bstan pa rnams la mtha' yas pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-15: nges pa'i tshig rnams la mu med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-16: ye shes kyis chags pa med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-17: blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-18: bden pa bstan pa rnams la don zab pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-19: thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-20: ting nge 'dzin gyi lhun po dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-21: 'khor gyi nang na seng ge dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-22: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams la padma dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-23: sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bas sa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-24: nyon mongs pa dang sred pa 'khru bas chu dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:301b-25: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas me dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-0: @302a *// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pas zla ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-1: nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel bas nyi ma dang mtshungs pa yin no; ;nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i dgra 'joms pas dpa' bo dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-2: sems shin tu dul bas glang po dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-3: chos sngon du sgrogs pas 'brug dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-4: chos kyi char 'bebs pas char pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-5: sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad zhi bar byed pas sman pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-6: chos kyi rgyal srid byed pas rgyal po dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-7: 'jig rten gyi chos skyong bas 'jig rten skyong ba dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-8: lha dang mi rnams kyi spyan du gyur pas brgya byin dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-9: dbang thob ste rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur bas tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-10: gnas med par rgyu bas bya dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-11: 'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag pas ri dvags spre'u dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-12: sems can thams cad kyi nyes par byas pa thams cad bzod pas ma dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-13: bzo thams cad slob pas pha dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302a-14: chos rin po che thams cad sbyin pas rnam thos kyi bu dang mtshungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-0: bsod @302b nams dag gis brgyan pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-1: mtshan rnams kyis klubs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-2: dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-3: 'jig rten gyis blta bar bya ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-5: 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pas mi dbul ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-7: rig pa rnams kyis bsngags pa yin no; ;mkhas pa thams cad kyis skur ba mi gdab pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-8: lha rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-9: klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis legs par bzung ba yin no; ;chos bstan pa rnams la dbang phyug tu gyur pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-10: mngon par shes pa rnams la dbang bsgyur ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-11: sems can gyi bsam pa rnams la rjes su song ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-12: sems can gyi dbang po rnams la rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-13: chos bstan pa la chog mi shes pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-14: rnyed pa dang bkur sti don du mi gnyer ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-15: chos bstan pa dag la ser sna med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-16: tshul khrims rnam par dag pas nyon mongs pa med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-17: bzod pa yongs su dag pas gnod pa med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-18: brtson 'grus yongs su dag pas las kyi mtha' legs par mthar phyin pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:302b-19: bsam gtan yongs su dag pas cang shes pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-0: shes rab yongs su dag pas @303a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-1: blo legs par dkar ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-2: tshad med pa rnams la tshangs pa'i bla ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-5: snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-6: byang chub kyi lam gyis bla na med pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-7: dbang bskur ba thob pas yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-9: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa ni yon tan gyi bsngags pa tshad med pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-11: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas phrin las gzhan mi mdzad par lo brgya stong du rgyun du byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang zad par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-14: de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa mtha' yas pa brjod pa mdzad pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-15: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-16: lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-18: 'di la yang dag pa don dam par na gang de ltar bsngags pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303a-20: gang la kha dog med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-0: dbyibs @303b med pa de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-1: gzugs kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-4: dbyibs 'ba' zhig yod pa de'i bsngags pa ni brjod par nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rgyal po bzang gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-7: chos thams cad ni ma bsdus pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-8: nga yi ba ma mchis pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-9: yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-10: gang gis kyang nye bar sprad par bgyi ba ma lags pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-11: gang gis kyang gsal ba ma lags pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-12: 'di la brtson pa dang yang dag par sbyor bar bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-14: brtson pa dang yang dag par sbyor bar gyur pa rnams la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-17: dper bgyi na sa chen po 'di ni chab kyi phung po'i steng na gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-18: de la mi gang zhig khron pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-19: khron pa chen po rko ba de chab dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-20: gang mi rko ba des ni mi rnyed pa lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-22: de bzhin du thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes de la su zhig brtson par bgyid pa de ni ye shes thob par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:303b-23: su brtson par mi bgyid pa des ni ye shes 'thob par mi 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-0: byang chub don du gnyer ba rnams kyis rtag tu brtson pa dang brtson 'grus brtsam par @304a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-2: de ltar na de dag la chos de dag mngon du 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-6: skyes bu dmus long gis de las skyes pa'i gzugs rnams mi mthong lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-8: de bzhin du nyon mongs pas ldongs pa'i sems can rnams kyang de las skyes pa'i chos rnams mi mthong lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-12: skyes bu mig dang ldan yang snang ba ma mchis na mi mthong lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang dag lha'i mig dang ldan pa lags kyang de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag ma mchis na mos par mi 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-18: lha'i mig la snang bas bgyi ba ma mchis so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-20: de bzhin du yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba la yang dag par rjes su bstan mi 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-24: mngal na mchis pa'i sems can ni mi gda' mi mthong yang skye lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-26: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub kyang mi mthong mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304a-27: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis kyang skye'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-1: ri'i rgyal po gangs can la shing ljon pa gang skyes pa de ni bar ma dor chags pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-4: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i chos la sbyor ba la brtson pa gang gi shes pa skyes pa de yang mi 'jig cing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-8: gang gi tshe 'khor lo sa bsgyur ba'i rgyal po byung ba de'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-9: rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-11: glang po rin po che dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-13: nor bu rin po che dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-14: bud med rin po che dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-15: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-16: bdun pa blon po rin po che dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-18: de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub kyi sems skye ba de'i tshe chos rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-28: gang gi tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba de'i tshe sems can rnams la de'i byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:304b-30: de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-2: don mthun pas sems can dag sdud pa de'i tshe sems can rnams la de tha dad pa ma mchis lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-6: gang gi tshe 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mdun khang na mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-7: rtsod pa ma mchis lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-9: de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'phel ba'i gtam gyi slad du mchis pa de'i tshe 'thab pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-10: rtsod pa'i gtam ma mchis lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-14: gang gi tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas par 'gyur pa de'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-15: thog mar ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-16: rgya mtsho chen po gnas par 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-18: de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-20: snying rje chen por thog mar gnas lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-24: gang gi tshe gdugs 'char ba de'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-25: ri gang dag mtho ba de dag la thog mar 'od zer 'bab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305a-27: de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi snang ba thogs mar byung ba de'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-0: sems can gang @305b dag dge ba'i tsab sbyangs pa de dag gis ye shes kyi snang ba de myong bar 'gyur lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-8: nags tshal thams cad ni sas bzed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-9: thams cad las bcud mnyam du gtang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-11: de bzhin du gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad la chos kyi bsam pa'i gtong bas sems chags pa ma mchis par gtong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rgyal po bzang la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-13: lha'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpe dgod pa bstan pa 'di legs par smras pa legs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-15: lha'i bu rtsva dang nags tshal ji snyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-18: sgra'i brda dag ji snyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-20: kha dog gi brda dag ji snyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-21: sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-22: ming dang gzugs rab tu brjod pa ji snyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-23: sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ji snyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-24: sems can rnams kyi yongs su spyod pa zas skom ji snyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:305b-26: byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa'i dpe dgod par bstan pa yang de snyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-0: gzungs thong pa'i byang chub sems @306a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-1: dpa'i tshig gang ci yang rung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-2: sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-8: chos su snang ba gang ci yang rung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-9: de la gang snang bar mi 'gyur ba de med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-10: de la gzhan las thos pa la rag las pa'i spobs pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-11: gzhan gyi dor lta ba la rag las pa'i bstan pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-14: thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-15: thams cad la 'jug pa'i rjes su sngo ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-16: de la rgyun chad pa med do; ;chags pa med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-19: de sangs rgyas brgya stong gi spyan sngar ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-20: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gzungs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-24: de ston kyang zhum par mi 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-25: kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-27: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de chags pa med pa gsum gyi rjes su sngo ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-29: bdag la chags pa med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-30: sems can la chags pa med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-31: chos la chags pa med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306a-32: yongs su dag pa gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-0: chos kyi dbyings @306b yongs su dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-1: de bzhin nyid yongs su dag pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-2: yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su dag pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-3: mi zad pa gsum gyi rjes su song ba yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-6: yi ge mi zad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-8: byin gyi rlabs gsum thob pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-10: spobs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-11: chos kyi don gyi byin rlabs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-12: chos la 'jug pa'i byin gyi rlabs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-13: dga' ba gsum thob pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-15: ye shes kyi dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-16: shes rab kyi dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-17: the tshom chad pas dga' ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-18: myur ba gsum thob pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-23: gzungs kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa mi zad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-24: byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas gzungs thob par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-25: gzungs kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa'i dpe dgod pa'i mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-29: slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:306b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-0: @307a *// dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-1: ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba las chos sba ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-2: bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag thos pa de dag khyod kyis dran nam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyas [*kyis] bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-7: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-8: de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad sba ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-9: bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag khyod kyis 'khor 'di la rjod cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-10: de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-11: de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te; gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-13: dza ye dza ya ma ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-17: ma me ma ma ma ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-22: aa re a'a ra ma ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-27: m'u la aa nu ga te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-28: aad te mad ti mad ti te a'a di m'a di /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-30: khu ru khu ru san dhi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-32: dharma dakshe dha rma pra be sha /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-33: sa re sa re sa re aa be dhe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307a-36: ae ta d'a nu ga ma /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-0: bdud rnams tshar gcod pa mu @307b stegs can rnams 'joms pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-1: chos la gnod par sems pa rnams rmugs par byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-2: nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-3: chos kyi tshul rnams 'bar bar byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-4: chos smra ba rnams kun du bsrung ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-6: byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-7: 'khor yang dag par 'jog pa chos nyan pa rnams la lus sbyin par byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-8: yang dag par song ba rnams kyis bsams pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-9: yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis blta ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-10: gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams mngon du gyur pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-15: bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid du chud za bar ma gyur cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-16: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag yongs su brjod ma thag tu de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g-yos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-17: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags nas lus btud te thal mo sbyar te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:307b-20: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-0: bdag cag gis chos smra ba su'i kha'i sgo nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byung ba de la rim @308a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-4: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi dpal ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bzod par rngo ma thog lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-6: bdag cag nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sba bar bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-7: glags lta ba gzhan dag kyang tshar gcad par bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i lta stangs kyis phyogs bzhi kun tu gzigs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-9: de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-12: sha me sha tru nir gh'a ta ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-14: m'u la pa ri tshin ne /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-15: m'a r'a see n+ya bi tr'a sa ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-16: mug te mug ta ba ti shud dhe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-20: tad de bi dye bidya ba rod ta me /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-21: pha rol rgol ba tshar gcod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-22: chos smra ba dag kun sdud pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-23: chos kyi mdzod ni kun bsrung ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-24: rig sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas gsungs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-25: aa ma aa ma me ma me /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-29: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dgug pa'i tshig rnams smras pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-33: shu bhe shu bha ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-35: lha'i dpang po brgya byin 'dir dgug par byas pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-36: mee tri so ma ba ti /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-38: kri pa ka ru no da hri te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-40: au pe ksha sam pan te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308a-41: tshangs pa yang 'dir dgug par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-4: bdud ni tshur gcad bya ba'i phyir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-5: gsang sngags gzhi ni 'di dag smras //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-6: mdo sde legs par bshad pa 'di //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-7: mi yi dbang pos byin gyis brlabs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-8: gang tshe shes par 'gyur ba ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-9: de yi tshe na spyod par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-10: gsang sngags 'di dag rab brjod pas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-11: sa ni rab tu g-yos par gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-12: bdud rnams thams cad lhags gyur te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-13: 'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-14: phyi ma'i dus na mdo sde 'di //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-15: gang dag lag tu mchi 'gyur ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-16: chos smra mkhas pa de dag ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-17: bdag cag rnams kyis bsrung bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-20: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs par shes par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-21: byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni sus kyang rnam par dkrug par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-25: 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa ma smad pa zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-26: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:308b-27: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-0: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @309a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-1: rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gsung rab la dge slong chos smra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-5: mthu che ba shes rab 'phags zhes bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-6: bden pas byin zhes bya ba gnyis byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-7: chos smra ba de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de las gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bzung nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-8: bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bskal pa phyed tshang bar rjes su bskor nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-10: bdud bye ba khrag brgya 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad yongs su smin par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-11: byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de bzhugs sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-15: 'on te yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de ni shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya stong phrag bcu 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba na bzhugs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa khri thub bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @309b de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud gang dag 'khod pa de dag khros shing dngang bar 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa des gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis de dag btul /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-2: legs par yongs su btul te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-3: de dag thams cad kyang byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-6: gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba de'i gsung rab la tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas byang chub tu nges par byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-7: nga ni shes rab 'phags zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po ni bden pas byin zhes bya bar gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-10: de ltar nged gnyis lhan cig tu mthun par bag yod par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa dag la bsti stang du byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-15: de ltar na gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bdud tshar gcad pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-16: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gces spras byed par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:309b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa grangs med par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir gzung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-1: bsrung bar khyed kyi nang nas su spro /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-2: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-3: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-4: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-5: lus dang srog kyang spang bgyis la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-6: rnam par smin la mi re bar //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-7: 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-8: mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-9: rgyal po bzang la sogs pa lha'i bu lnga stong gis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-11: bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di gzung bar bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-12: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-13: sems can kun gyi don slad du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-14: snying rje brtan par bskyed nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-15: sangs rgyas kyis gzungs zab pa yi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-16: mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-17: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-18: tshangs pa gtsug phud can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-19: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-20: nad kun las ni thar bgyid pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-22: ston pa lags par sems bskyed de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310a-23: bdag cag gis kyang gzung bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-0: de nas bcom ldan la 'das la gsang ba pa'i @310b bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-2: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa grangs ma mchis par bsgrubs pa 'di gzung bar bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-3: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-4: chos 'di yi ge ma mchis na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-5: mi yi dbang pos thugs rje yis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-6: yi ge rnams kyis rab bshad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-7: da ni bdag gis gzung bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa gtsug phud can la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-10: gsum po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-11: rim gro byed pa bla na med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-12: mchod pa'i las bla na med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-13: bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-15: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-16: gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-17: gang ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa ste; tshangs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-18: gsum po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-19: rim gro bya ba bla na med pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:310b-21: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa bskal pa'i bar du bstan du zin kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-1: bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-2: rim gro bya ba bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas mchod pa'i dngos po gsum po 'di dag gis mchod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos kyi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yongs su bzung na 'das pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-6: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni chos las nges par 'byung ba yin pas de chos kyis mchod par bya'i //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-10: zang zing gis ni ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-11: dam pa'i chos kyi mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi nang du mchog tu bshad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-15: ngas mngon par shes te 'das pa'i dus na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-16: nga rgyal po'i pho brang zhig tu skyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-17: rgyal po gzhon nu blo gros ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de na nga gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na tshigs su bcad pa gnyis thos nas bzung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-18: nga sad nas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-19: bdag gis gter chen po zhig rnyed do snyam nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-20: ngas gter chen po rnyed do zhes skad cher phyung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-21: nga'i pha ma gnyis na re /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311a-22: gzhon nu gter ga la yod ces zer ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-0: ngas pha ma gnyis la tshigs su @311b bcad de smras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-1: 'jig rten gter chen rnams ni rgyal po dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-2: rkun po me chus bslus pas zad par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos gter ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-4: bskal pa bye ba mang por chud mi za //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-5: sems can don brtson byang chub sems dang ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-6: tshul bzhin nyid kyis dben sems gang yin dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-7: rtag tu bag yod 'chi med rgyu yin te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-8: yongs su 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-10: tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis ngas rmi lam du thos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-12: ngas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis kyis sems can brgyad stong ni byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-13: srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong ni bde 'gro thob par byas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-14: tshangs pa khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang ji ltar gang dag thos pa la brtson pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-15: brtson nas yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-16: bsgrubs pa la gnas nas kyang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa de dag gis gter chen po thob par de ltar rig par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-17: tshangs pa; theg pa chen po la gces spras byed pa'i chos gnyis te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-19: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-20: thos pa tshol bas chog mi shes pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:311b-23: de lta bas na chos kyi tshul 'di rgyun ma bcad cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-0: tshangs pa khyod kyis bskal pa bzang po pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang @312a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-1: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-3: bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de 'dra bar yongs su dag pa'i sems can du 'gyur na ni /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-4: der khyod btang snyoms can du 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-6: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa can gyi dus 'di na su zhig nyin gcig gam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-7: mtshan gcig dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de ni ches mang gi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su bskal pa brgya stong gis ni de lta ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-10: de lta bas na khyod kyis dus ngan pa 'dir dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus su bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i le'u klu'i gzungs chen po bstan pa 'di long zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-16: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di skye bo phal pa la ma bshad cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312a-21: sems can dman pa la mos pa rnams ni 'di la mgo rmongs par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-0: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di @312b ni de tsam du mos par dka' ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-1: de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-2: sems can gang dag cang shes pa sbyangs pa legs par byas pa chos 'di dag gi snod du gyur pa ma gtogs te; de dag ni chos kyi tshul gyi rgyud 'di thos na skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-3: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-7: bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-8: mthu ci mchis pas rdo ci thog tu gzung bar bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-11: kun dga' bo khyod kyis sems can chen po dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir langs pa 'di dag mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-17: 'di dag thams cad ni khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa na phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-19: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-23: de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag na rdo rje'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:312b-24: 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-1: bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-2: 'di bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i skyes bu gang zag gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sa'i steng nas bzung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-5: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du rin po cha thams cad kyis yongs su bkang nas sbyin pa byin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-6: de'i rnam par smin pa la re babs gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bton te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-7: zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-8: 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-9: de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i le'u dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-10: bsod nams tshad med pa 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-11: dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa na srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-12: byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri drug stong ni bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-13: srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-14: dge slong stong drug brgya ni sems rnam par grol lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313a-15: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag ni rab tu g-yos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-0: lha brgya stong dag @313b gis ni rol mo'i sil snyan blangs shing me tog gi char yang rab tu phab ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-1: 'di skad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du shin tu yun ring du gnas par gyur cig ces kyang smras so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-2: gsang pa pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-3: byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-4: lha'i bu rgyal po bzang dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-5: rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-6: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-12: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-14: dam pa'i chos yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-15: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-18: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-21: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba ban dhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-003:313b-22: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang gtan la phab pa //
